blocks.name: csu
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include finite and infinite summations. (An underscore was added to the ASCII token in order to facilitate set.mm text searches, since "sum" is a commonly used word in comments.)
blocks.origin: prop class csu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) { sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1) }

df-sum
blocks.content: Define the sum of a series with an index set of integers ` A ` . ` k ` is normally a free variable in ` B ` , i.e. ` B ` can be thought of as ` B ( k ) ` . This definition is the result of a collection of discussions over the most general definition for a sum that does not need the index set to have a specified ordering. This definition is in two parts, one for finite sums and one for subsets of the upper integers. When summing over a subset of the upper integers, we extend the index set to the upper integers by adding zero outside the domain, and then sum the set in order, setting the result to the limit of the partial sums, if it exists. This means that conditionally convergent sums can be evaluated meaningfully. For finite sums, we are explicitly order-independent, by picking any bijection to a 1-based finite sequence and summing in the induced order. These two methods of summation produce the same result on their common region of definition (i.e. finite sets of integers) by ~ summo . Examples: ` sum_ k e. { 1 , 2 , 4 } ` ` k ` means ` 1 + 2 + 4 = 7 ` , and ` sum_ k e. NN ` ` ( 1 / ( 2 ^ k ) ) = 1 ` means 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + ... = 1 ( ~ geoihalfsum ). (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)

axiom df-sum(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cio(s1, wo(wrex(s2, cz, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(s2))), wbr(cseq(cv(s2), caddc, cmpt(s3, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(s3), c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s3), c0)))), cli, cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, cn, wex(s4, wa(wf1o(cv(s4), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s2)), c0), wceq(cv(s1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(s3, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(s4), cv(s3)), c1))), cv(s2)))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
}

thm sumex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), universe)
} = {
  eqeltri(csu(s0, c0, c1), universe, cio(hs2, wo(wrex(hs0, cz, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wbr(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), cli, cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs0, cn, wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c1))), cv(hs0)))))))))
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c1)
  iotaex(hs2, wo(wrex(hs0, cz, wa(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wbr(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c1), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), cli, cv(hs2)))), wrex(hs0, cn, wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c1))), cv(hs0))))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

thm sumex(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ 𝕌
} = {
  eqeltri(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), universe, iota(hs2,(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))))))
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c1)
  iotaex(hs2, (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0))))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
}

  rexbidv(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wbr(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), cli, cv(hs2))), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wbr(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))), cli, cv(hs2))))
  anbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wss(c0, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wbr(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), cli, cv(hs2)), wss(c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))), wbr(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))), cli, cv(hs2)))
  sseq1(c0, c1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)))
  breq1d(cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))), cli, cv(hs2), cseq(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  seqeq3d(cv(hs0), caddc, cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), cmpt(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpteq2dva(hs1, cz, cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), cif(csb(s0, cv(hs1), c2), nat0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wceq(c0, c1))

  simpl(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), cz))
  rexbidv(hs0, cn, wceq(c0, c1), wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c2))), cv(hs0))))), wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c2))), cv(hs0))))))
  exbidv(hs3, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c2))), cv(hs0)))), wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c1), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c2))), cv(hs0)))))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, c1), wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, cmpt(hs1, cn, csb(s0, cfv(cv(hs3), cv(hs1)), c2))), cv(hs0))), wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)), c1))
  f1oeq3(c0, c1, cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs0)))
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c2)

thm sumeq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 = c1 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)= sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), iota(hs2,(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0)))))), iota(hs2,(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c1)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0)))))), c0 = c1)
  iotabidv(hs2, c0 = c1, (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0))))), (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c1)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0))))))
  orbi12d(c0 = c1, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0)))), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c1)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0)))))
  rexbidv(hs0, cz, c0 = c1, (c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2), (c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))
  anbi12d(c0 = c1, c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0), seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2, c1 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0), seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2)
  sseq1(c0, c1, (ℤ≥ ` hs0))
  breq1d(seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0)))), cli, hs2, seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0)))), c0 = c1)
  seqeq3d(hs0, caddc, (hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0)), (hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0)), c0 = c1)
  mpteq2dva(hs1, cz, if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0), if(hs1 ∈ c1,[hs1 / s0]c2, 0), c0 = c1)
  ifbid([hs1 / s0]c2, nat0, (c0 = c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ), hs1 ∈ c0, hs1 ∈ c1)
  eleq2d(hs1, c0, c1, (c0 = c1 ∧ hs1 ∈ ℤ))
  simpl(c0 = c1, hs1 ∈ ℤ)
  rexbidv(hs0, cn, c0 = c1, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0))), ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c1)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0))))
  exbidv(hs3, c0 = c1, ((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0)), ((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c1)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0)))
  anbi1d(c0 = c1, (hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0), hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c2)))` hs0), (hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c1))
  f1oeq3(c0, c1, hs3, (1[...]hs0))
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c2)
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c1, c2)
  diff.hs2.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs3.w(c0 = c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)

  ⊢ F/(s0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), iota(hs2,(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))))))
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c1)
  nfiota(s0, hs2, (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0))))))
  nfor(s0, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))))
  nfrex(s0, hs0, cz, (c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))
  nfan(s0, c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0), seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2)
  nfss(s0, c0, (ℤ≥ ` hs0))

  nfex(s0, hs3, ((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))
  nfan(s0, (hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0), hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0))
  nff1o(s0, hs3, (1[...]hs0), c0)

} = {

  iotabidv(hs2, ∀(s0, c0 = c1), (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c0, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c2)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c0)))` hs0))))), (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c2)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0))))))
  orbi12d(∀(s0, c0 = c1), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c0, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c2)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c0)))` hs0)))), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c2)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))))
  rexbidv(hs0, cz, ∀(s0, c0 = c1), (c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c0, 0))))[~~>]hs2), (c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))
  anbi2d(∀(s0, c0 = c1), c2 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0), seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c0, 0))))[~~>]hs2, seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c2,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2)

blocks.name: sumeq2ii
blocks.content: Equality theorem for sum, with the class expressions ` B ` and ` C ` guarded by ` _I ` to be always sets. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumeq2ii(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(cfv(cid, c1), cfv(cid, c2))), wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c0, c2)))

thm cbvsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ c0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ c0, c2), F/(s1, c0))
  a1ii(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ c0, c2), F/(s0, c0))
  a1ii(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ c0, c2), d(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4i(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(s1 ∈ c0, c2), iota(hs2,(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))))), iota(hs2,(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2)))` hs0)))))))
  iotabii(hs2, (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0))))), (∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))∨ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2)))` hs0))))))
  orbi12i(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0)))), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ,(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℕ, ∃(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0)∧ hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2)))` hs0)))))
  rexbii(hs0, cz, (c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2), (c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0)∧ seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2))
  anbi2i(c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` hs0), seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))[~~>]hs2, seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0))))[~~>]hs2)
  breq1i(seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0)))), cli, hs2, seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0)))))
  mptru(seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0))))= seq(hs0(+,(hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0)))))
  seqeq3d(hs0, caddc, (hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s0]c1, 0)), (hs1 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(hs1 ∈ c0,[hs1 / s1]c2, 0)), wtru)

  ifeq1d([hs1 / s0]c1, nat0, [hs1 / s1]c2, wtru, hs1 ∈ c0)
  a1i(wtru, [hs1 / s0]c1 =[hs1 / s1]c2)

  anbi2i((hs3 :(1[...]hs0)↔ c0), hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0), hs2 =(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2)))` hs0))
  eqeq2i(hs2, (seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))` hs0), (seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2)))` hs0))
  fveq1i(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1))), hs0, seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2))))
  mptru(seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1)))= seq(1(+,(hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2))))
  seqeq3d(nat1, caddc, (hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1), (hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2), wtru)
  mpteq2dv(hs1, cn, [(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1, [(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, [(hs3 ` hs1)/ s0]c1 =[(hs3 ` hs1)/ s1]c2)
  cbvcsb(s0, s1, (hs3 ` hs1), c1, c2)
  df-sum(s0, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c1)
  df-sum(s1, hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, c2)

blocks.name: cbvsumv

thm cbvsumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvsum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvsumv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ c0, c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c1 = c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  cbvsum(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c2)
}

thm 2sumeq2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c3))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2), csu(s1, c1, c3), w0)
  sumeq2dv(s1, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

thm 2sumeq2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c3)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ c2 = c3)

} = {

thm fsumcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→ c4 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆(c0[...]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)), d(s0, c2))
  climconst(hs0, seq(c0(+, c1)), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2), (ℤ≥ ` c2), c2, universe, w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c2))
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  eluzelz(c2, c0)
  a1i(w0, seq(c0(+, c1))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  eqcomd((seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2)))
  seqid2(hs1, c0, caddc, c1, c2, hs0, cc, nat0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2)))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2)), hs1 ∈ ℂ, (hs1[+]0)= hs1)
  addid1(hs1)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2), c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)∈ ℂ)
  ffvelrnd(seq(c0(+, c1)), c2, cc, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0)
  serf(s0, c0, c1, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  eluzel2(c2, c0)
  eqeltrd((c1 ` s0), cc, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)))
  syl2anr(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (c1 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), s0 ∈ ℤ, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)∈ ℂ)
  eluzelz(s0, c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)∈ ℂ)
  pm2.61d1(w0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c3)
  ex(w0, s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)∈ ℂ)
  eqeltrd(if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), cc, c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)= c4)
  iftrue(c4, nat0, s0 ∈ c3)
  syl6eqel(if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), cc, nat0, ¬ s0 ∈ c3)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2), hs1 ∈((c2[+]1)[...]hs0), (c1 ` hs1)= 0)
  sylan2(w0, hs1 ∈((c2[+]1)[...]hs0), (c1 ` hs1)= 0, hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1)))
  elfzuz(hs1, (c2[+]1), hs0)
  syl((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1))), (c1 ` hs1)= 0, hs1 ∈(ℤ \ c3))
  eldifd(hs1, cz, c3, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1))))
  adantl(w0, hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1)), hs1 ∈ ℤ)
  eluzelz(hs1, (c2[+]1))
  imp(w0, hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1)), ¬ hs1 ∈ c3)
  con2d(w0, hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1)), hs1 ∈ c3)
  syl6(w0, hs1 ∈ c3, ¬ hs1 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c2[+]1)), hs1 ∈(c0[...]c2))
  sseld(hs1, c3, (c0[...]c2), w0)
  fznuz(hs1, c0, c2)
  vtoclga(s0, hs1, (ℤ \ c3), (c1 ` hs1)= 0, (c1 ` s0)= 0)
  fveqeq2(s0, hs1, c1, nat0)
  eqtrd((c1 ` s0), nat0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), s0 ∈(ℤ \ c3))

  eldifi(s0, cz, c3)
  syl6eqel(if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), cc, nat0, s0 ∈(ℤ \ c3))
  0cn()
  fvmpt2(s0, cz, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), cc, c1)

  eldifn(s0, cz, c3)
  iffalse(c4, nat0, s0 ∈ c3)

  diff.cdif.s(s0, cz, c3)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c1 ` hs1), nat0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Rebase the starting point of a sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2014.)

thm sumrb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, cif(c5, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c4))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(c5, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c4, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpjaodan(w0, wb(wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  bitr3d(wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))), wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cres(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c3)), cli, c2))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))), wb(wbr(cres(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c3)), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c3, cz))
  seqex(c0, caddc, c1)
  climres(c3, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), universe, c2)
  breq1d(cres(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c3)), cli, c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  mpidan(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wceq(cres(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c3)), cseq(c3, caddc, c1)), wss(c4, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  sumrblem(s0, c4, c3, c0, c1, c5, wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c5, cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  bitr3d(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))), wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2), wbr(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c2))
  breq1d(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c2, cseq(c0, caddc, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))))
  mpidan(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), wceq(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cseq(c0, caddc, c1)), wss(c4, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  sumrblem(s0, c4, c0, c3, c1, c5, wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(c5, cc))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))), wb(wbr(cres(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cfv(cuz, c0)), cli, c2), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), cli, c2)), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cseq(c3, caddc, c1), universe))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seqex(c3, caddc, c1)
  climres(c0, cseq(c3, caddc, c1), universe, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wo(wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cz))
  uztric(c0, c3)

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c3)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm sumrb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>]c2 ↔ seq(c3(+, c1))[~~>]c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c4, c5, 0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→ c5 ∈ ℂ)

blocks.name: summo
blocks.content: A sum has at most one limit. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: zsum
blocks.content: Series sum with index set a subset of the upper integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm zsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)))), diffsc(s0, c2))

blocks.name: isum
blocks.content: Series sum with an upper integer index set (i.e. an infinite series). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3))))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  ssidd(c0, w0)
  eqtr4d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=(~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  ssidd(c0, w0)
  eqtr4d((c3 ` s0), if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0), c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 ∈ c0)
}

blocks.name: sum0
blocks.content: Any sum over the empty set is zero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm sum0(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wceq(csu(s0, emptycls, c0), nat0)
} = {
  eqtri(csu(s0, emptycls, c0), nat0, cfv(cli, cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)))))
  mptru(wceq(csu(s0, emptycls, c0), cfv(cli, cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))))))
  zsum(s0, emptycls, c0, nat1, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)), cn, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, cz))
  a1i(wtru, wss(emptycls, cn))
  0ss(cn)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls)), nat0, wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  syl(wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)), cv(s0)), nat0), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1)))
  syl6eleq(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1), cn, wa(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn)))
  simpr(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnuz()
  fvconst2(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat1), nat0)
  c0ex()
  iffalsei(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cc))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(c0, cc))
  noel(cv(s0))
  mp2(wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0)))), nat0), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))), cli, nat0))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  ax-mp(wbr(cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))), cli, nat0), wcel(nat1, cz))
  1z()
  serclim0(nat1)
  funbrfv(cli, cseq(nat1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))), nat0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, cfv(cuz, nat1), csn(nat0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, nat1)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, nat0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
}

  ⊢ sum(s0 ∈ ∅, c0)= 0
} = {
  eqtri(sum(s0 ∈ ∅, c0), nat0, (~~> ` seq(1(+,((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 })))))
  mptru(sum(s0 ∈ ∅, c0)=(~~> ` seq(1(+,((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 })))))

  a1i(wtru, 1 ∈ ℤ)
  a1i(wtru, ∅ ⊆ ℕ)
  0ss(cn)
  syl6eqr((((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 })` s0), if(s0 ∈ ∅, c0, 0), nat0, (T ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  syl((T ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ), (((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 })` s0)= 0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1))
  syl6eleq(s0, (ℤ≥ ` 1), cn, (T ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ))
  simpr(wtru, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnuz()
  fvconst2(s0, (ℤ≥ ` 1), nat0)
  c0ex()
  iffalsei(c0, nat0, s0 ∈ ∅)
  adantl(wtru, s0 ∈ ∅, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  pm2.21i(s0 ∈ ∅, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  noel(s0)
  mp2((~~> ` seq(1(+,((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 }))))= 0, Fun(~~>), seq(1(+,((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 })))[~~>]0)
  ax-mp(Fun(~~>), (~~> : dom(~~>)→ ℂ))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, dom(~~>), cc)
  ax-mp(seq(1(+,((ℤ≥ ` 1)× { 0 })))[~~>]0, 1 ∈ ℤ)
  1z()
  serclim0(nat1)

  fvconst2(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c1), nat0)

  mpsyl(wa(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wcel(c1, cz)), wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, c1), csn(nat0)))), nat0), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c1, caddc, cxp(cfv(cuz, c1), csn(nat0))), cli, nat0))

  biimpac(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, c1)), wn(wcel(c1, cz)), wss(c0, emptycls))
  sseq2d(c0, cfv(cuz, c1), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, cz)))
  sylnbir(wcel(c1, cz), wceq(cfv(cuz, c1), emptycls), wcel(c1, cdm(cuz)))

  ndmfv(c1, cuz)

  fz1f1o(hs0, c0)

blocks.name: fsumf1o
blocks.content: Re-index a finite sum using a bijection. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumf1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, c2, c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wf1o(c5, c2, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

blocks.name: sumss
blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in an upper integer sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: fsumss
blocks.content: Change the index set to a subset in a finite sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)

  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))[~~>](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))→(c1 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→ c4 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆(c0[...]c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

  ralrimiva(s0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0, (c1 ` s0)=((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))` s0))
  eqtr4d((c1 ` s0), ((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))` s0), if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)))
  syl2anr(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), ((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), s0 ∈ ℤ, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)∈ ℂ)
  eluzelz(s0, c0)
  pm2.61d1(w0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c3)

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦ if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0)))
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumsers
blocks.content: Special case of series sum over a finite upper integer index set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)

thm fsumsers(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, co(c2, cfz, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4), cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), w0)
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cuz, c2), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, c2))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eluzel2(c4, c2)
  syl6ss(c0, cfv(cuz, c2), co(c2, cfz, c4), w0)
  fzssuz(c2, c4)
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4)), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cli, cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4)))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  fsumcvg2(s0, c2, c3, c4, c0, c1, w0)
  funbrfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), c4))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c2)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm fsumsers(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=(seq(c2(+, c3))` c4))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))→(c3 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c0, c1, 0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆(c2[...]c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (seq(c2(+, c3))` c4), (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), w0)
  zsum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, (ℤ≥ ` c2), w0)
  eqid((ℤ≥ ` c2))
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ ℤ, c4 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))
  eluzel2(c4, c2)
  syl6ss(c0, (ℤ≥ ` c2), (c2[...]c4), w0)
  fzssuz(c2, c4)
  mpsyl(w0, (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3)))=(seq(c2(+, c3))` c4), Fun(~~>), seq(c2(+, c3))[~~>](seq(c2(+, c3))` c4))
  ax-mp(Fun(~~>), (~~> : dom(~~>)→ ℂ))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, dom(~~>), cc)
  fsumcvg2(s0, c2, c3, c4, c0, c1, w0)
  funbrfv(cli, seq(c2(+, c3)), (seq(c2(+, c3))` c4))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c2)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm fsumcvg3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

thm fsumcvg3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→ c4 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  rexlimddv(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0, seq(c0(+, c1))∈ dom(~~>), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0))
  pm2.61ne(c3, emptycls, w0, ∃(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0)), ∃(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), ∅ ⊆(c0[...]hs0)))
  rexbidv(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 = ∅, c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0), ∅ ⊆(c0[...]hs0))
  sseq1(c3, emptycls, (c0[...]hs0))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), ∃(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0)), sup(c3, ℝ, <)∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)))
  ssrdv(s0, c3, (c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)), (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅))
  ex((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈(c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)))
  mpbird(((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅)∧ s0 ∈ c3), s0 ∈(c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)), s0[≤]sup(c3, ℝ, <))
  sylan((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), s0 ∈ c3, s0[≤]sup(c3, ℝ, <), (c3 ⊆ ℝ ∧ c3 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, hs0[≤]s0))))
  3jca((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), c3 ⊆ ℝ, c3 ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, hs0[≤]s0)))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ ℝ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, hs0[≤]s0)), c3 ⊆ ℝ, c3 ∈ Fin)
  fimaxre2(s0, hs0, c3)
  suprub(s0, hs0, c3, s0)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅)∧ s0 ∈ c3), (s0 ∈(c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <))↔ s0[≤]sup(c3, ℝ, <)), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), sup(c3, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ)
  sselda(s0, c3, (ℤ≥ ` c0), (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅))
  adantr((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), s0 ∈ c3, sup(c3, ℝ, <)∈ ℤ)
  sseldi(sup(c3, ℝ, <), cz, (ℤ≥ ` c0), (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅))
  sseldd(sup(c3, ℝ, <), (ℤ≥ ` c0), c3, (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅))
  syl6sseq(c3, (ℤ≥ ` c0), c2, (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅))
  sylancr((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), sup(c3, ℝ, <)∈ c3, < ≺ ℝ, (c3 ∈ Fin ∧ c3 ≠ ∅ ∧ c3 ⊆ ℝ))
  ltso()
  3jca((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅), c3 ∈ Fin, c3 ≠ ∅, c3 ⊆ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, c3 ≠ ∅, c3 ∈ Fin)
  simpr(w0, c3 ≠ ∅)
  syl6ss(c3, cr, c2, (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ ∅))
  adantr(w0, c3 ≠ ∅, c3 ⊆ c2)
  eqsstri(c2, cr, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  sstri((ℤ≥ ` c0), cr, cz)
  uzssz(c0)
  zssre()
  fisupcl(clt, cr, c3)

  rspcev(hs0, sup(c3, ℝ, <), (ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0))
  sseq2d(c3, (c0[...]hs0), (c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)), hs0 = sup(c3, ℝ, <))
  oveq2(hs0, sup(c3, ℝ, <), c0, cfz)

  syl(w0, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c0)
  0ss((c0[...]c0))
  rspcev(hs0, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), ∅ ⊆(c0[...]c0), ∅ ⊆(c0[...]hs0))

  oveq2(hs0, c0, c0, cfz)

  fsumcvg2(s0, c0, c1, hs0, c3, c4, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)∧ c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0))))
  adantlr(w0, (hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)∧ c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0)), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (c1 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0))
  sylan2br(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (c1 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c3, c4, 0), s0 ∈ c2)
  eleq2i(s0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0))
  adantlr(w0, (hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)∧ c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0)), s0 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ ℂ)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0))
  releldmi(seq(c0(+, c1)), cli, (seq(c0(+, c1))` hs0))
  climrel()
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(seq(c0(+, c1))∈ dom(~~>))
  diff.hs0.w(c3 = ∅)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, sup(c3, ℝ, <))
  diff.csup.s(s0, c3, cr, clt)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c3 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c3, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(sup(c3, ℝ, <))
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c3 ⊆(c0[...]sup(c3, ℝ, <)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∅ ⊆(c0[...]c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)∧ c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ⊆(c0[...]hs0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c3, (c0[...]hs0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, hs0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumser
blocks.content: A finite sum expressed in terms of a partial sum of an infinite series. The recursive definition follows as ~ fsum1 and ~ fsump1i , which should make our notation clear and from which, along with closure ~ fsumcl , we will derive the basic properties of finite sums. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)

thm fsumser(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

thm fsumcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(nat0, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  eqeltrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2, nat0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  syl6eq(csu(s0, c0, c1), nat0, csu(s0, emptycls, c1), wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  sumeq1d(s0, c0, c1, emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  sum0(s0, c1)
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, emptycls), wcel(nat0, c2))
  fsumcl2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, wa(w0, wne(c0, emptycls)))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c2, cc))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c2))
  adantr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c0, cfn))
  adantlr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s1, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  diff.wne.s(s2, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumcllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s2 ∈ c2))→(s1[+]s2)∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → 0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c0, emptycls, w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ c2)
  eqeltrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, nat0, (w0 ∧ c0 = ∅))
  syl6eq(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), nat0, sum(s0 ∈ ∅, c1), (w0 ∧ c0 = ∅))
  sumeq1d(s0, c0, c1, emptycls, (w0 ∧ c0 = ∅))
  simpr(w0, c0 = ∅)
  sum0(s0, c1)
  adantr(w0, c0 = ∅, 0 ∈ c2)
  fsumcl2lem(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ c0 ≠ ∅))
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, (s1 ∈ c2 ∧ s2 ∈ c2), (s1[+]s2)∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, c0 ∈ Fin)
  adantlr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2)
  simpr(w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s0, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s1, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, c0 ≠ ∅)
  diff.wne.s(s2, c0, emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s2)
}

blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fsumsplit
blocks.content: Split a sum into two parts. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1)), co(csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), caddc, csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), csu(s0, c0, co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), w0)
  oveq12d(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c2, c1), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wss(c2, c0), wral(s0, c2, wcel(c1, cc)), wo(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfn)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  sumss2(s0, c2, c0, c1, nat0)
  syl21anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c3, c1), csu(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))), wss(c3, c0), wral(s0, c3, wcel(c1, cc)), wo(wss(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfn)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c3, w0, wcel(c1, cc))
  olcd(w0, wss(c0, cfv(cuz, nat0)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  sumss2(s0, c3, c0, c1, nat0)
  fsumadd(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), w0)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat0, cc))
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat0, cc))
  0cn()
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  biimpa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syl6bb(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cun(c2, c3)))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  elun(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  jaodan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3), wceq(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1))
  eqtrd(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, co(c1, caddc, nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  oveq12d(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), c1))
  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  addid1d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c2, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c2, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c3)
  eqtrd(co(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))), c1, co(nat0, caddc, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  oveq12d(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), caddc, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), nat0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  con2d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sylibr(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c3))), wn(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3))))
  mtbii(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  noel(cv(s0))
  syl5rbbr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3)))
  elin(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  eleq2d(cv(s0), cin(c2, c3), emptycls, w0)

  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  addid2d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  sselda(cv(s0), c3, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c0, cun(c2, c3), w0)

thm fsumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=(sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(c2 ⋃ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr2rd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1)), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0))[+]sum(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0))), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0))), w0)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)), sum(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1)= sum(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)), c2 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ ℂ), (c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` 0)∨ c0 ∈ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  sumss2(s0, c2, c0, c1, nat0)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1)= sum(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)), c3 ⊆ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ ℂ), (c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` 0)∨ c0 ∈ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s0, c3, w0, c1 ∈ ℂ)
  olcd(w0, c0 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` 0), c0 ∈ Fin)
  sumss2(s0, c3, c0, c1, nat0)
  fsumadd(s0, c0, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0), if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0), w0)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, 0 ∈ ℂ)
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, s0 ∈ c2)
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ, 0 ∈ ℂ)
  0cn()
  ifcl(c1, cc, nat0, s0 ∈ c3)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)), c1, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0))= c1, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈ c3))
  biimpa(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈ c3))
  syl6bb(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∨ s0 ∈ c3), s0 ∈(c2 ⋃ c3))
  eleq2d(s0, c0, (c2 ⋃ c3), w0)
  elun(s0, c2, c3)
  jaodan(w0, s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c3, (if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0))= c1)
  eqtrd((if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)), c1, (c1[+]0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  oveq12d(if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0), caddc, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0), c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c2, if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 ∈ c2)
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2), s0 ∈ c3)
  imp(w0, s0 ∈ c2, ¬ s0 ∈ c3)
  addid1d(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c2, c1 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c0)
  sselda(s0, c2, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c2, c0, (c2 ⋃ c3), w0)
  ssun1(c2, c3)
  eqtrd((if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)), c1, (0[+]c1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  oveq12d(if(s0 ∈ c2, c1, 0), caddc, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0), nat0, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), s0 ∈ c2)
  imp(w0, s0 ∈ c3, ¬ s0 ∈ c2)
  con2d(w0, s0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c2)
  sylibr(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 → ¬ s0 ∈ c3), ¬(s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  mtbii(w0, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), s0 ∈ ∅)
  noel(s0)
  syl5rbbr(w0, s0 ∈ ∅, (s0 ∈ c2 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), s0 ∈(c2 ⋂ c3))
  elin(s0, c2, c3)
  eleq2d(s0, (c2 ⋂ c3), emptycls, w0)
  imnan(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈ c3)
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c3, c1, 0)= c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 ∈ c3)
  addid2d(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3))
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c0)
  sselda(s0, c3, c0, w0)
  syl5sseqr(c3, c0, (c2 ⋃ c3), w0)
  ssun2(c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: fsumsplitf
blocks.content: Split a sum into two parts. A version of ~ fsumsplit using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1))))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cin(c2, c3), emptycls))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cun(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1)), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), co(csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), caddc, csu(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  fsumsplit(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c2, c3, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc)))
  nfim(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), cc))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(co(csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), caddc, csu(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))), co(csu(s0, c2, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c3, c1))))
  oveq12i(csu(hs0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), caddc, csu(hs0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), csu(s0, c2, c1), csu(s0, c3, c1))
  cbvsumi(hs0, s0, c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)
  cbvsumi(hs0, s0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c1, csb(hs0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1a(hs0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1))
  eqtri(csb(hs0, cv(s0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), c1, csb(s0, cv(s0), c1))
  csbco(hs0, s0, cv(s0), c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm fsumsplitf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=(sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ⋂ c3)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(c2 ⋃ c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), (sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1)), sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1), (sum(hs0 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1)[+]sum(hs0 ∈ c3,[hs0 / s0]c1)), w0)
  a1i(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(hs0 ∈ c0,[hs0 / s0]c1))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  fsumsplit(hs0, c0, [hs0 / s0]c1, c2, c3, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)→[hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ), ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  nfim(s0, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  nfan(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, cc)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ ℂ, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℂ)
  anbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c0)
  eleq1d(c1, cc, [hs0 / s0]c1, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  a1i(w0, (sum(hs0 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1)[+]sum(hs0 ∈ c3,[hs0 / s0]c1))=(sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1)))
  oveq12i(sum(hs0 ∈ c2,[hs0 / s0]c1), caddc, sum(hs0 ∈ c3,[hs0 / s0]c1), sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c3, c1))
  cbvsumi(hs0, s0, c2, [hs0 / s0]c1, c1)
  cbvsumi(hs0, s0, c3, [hs0 / s0]c1, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcv(hs0, c1)
  syl6eq([hs0 / s0]c1, c1, [s0 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c1, hs0 = s0)
  csbeq1a(hs0, s0, [hs0 / s0]c1)
  eqtri([s0 / hs0][hs0 / s0]c1, c1, [s0 / s0]c1)
  csbco(hs0, s0, s0, c1)
  csbid(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sumsnf
blocks.content: A sum of a singleton is the term. A version of ~ sumsn using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumsnf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c3), c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, csn(c0), c3), c2, cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, csn(cop(nat1, c2))), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl5eq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c3), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, csn(cop(nat1, c2))), nat1), csu(hs0, csn(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, csn(c0), c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  fsum(hs0, hs1, csn(c0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1, csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3)
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(nat1, cn))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(c0)), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(nat1), csn(c0)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(nat1), csn(c0)), wcel(nat1, cn), wcel(c0, c1))
  f1osng(nat1, cn, c0, c1)
  mp2b(wb(wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(c0)), wf1o(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(nat1), csn(c0))), wcel(nat1, cz), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(nat1)))
  fzsn(nat1)
  f1oeq2(co(nat1, cfz, nat1), csn(nat1), csn(cop(nat1, c0)), csn(c0))
  eqeltrd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cc, csb(s0, c0, c3), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))))
  csbeq1d(s0, cv(hs0), c3, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqeltrd(csb(s0, c0, c3), cc, c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  simplr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)))
  3eqtr4rd(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), csb(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3), csb(s0, c0, c3), c2, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1))))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  csbiegf(s0, c0, c1, c3, c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2))
  csbeq1d(s0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c3, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1))))
  sylan9eqr(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1)), c0, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)))
  fveq2d(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), cv(hs1), nat1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c0)), nat1), c0), wcel(nat1, cn), wcel(c0, c1))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc))
  fvsng(nat1, cn, c0, c1)
  sylan9eqr(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1)), c2, cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)))
  fveq2d(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), cv(hs1), nat1, wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat1, cfz, nat1)))
  elfz1eq(cv(hs1), nat1)
  seq1i(nat1, caddc, csn(cop(nat1, c2)), c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)))
  1z()
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(nat1, c2)), nat1), c2), wcel(nat1, cn), wcel(c2, cc))
  1nn()
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc))
  fvsng(nat1, cn, c2, cc)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

blocks.name: fsumsplitsn
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite sum. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, c3)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, c3), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fsumsplitf(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, c0, csn(c1), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd(cun(c0, csn(c1)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  pm2.61dan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cc))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wcel(c2, cc), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantll(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)))
  elunnel1(cv(s0), c0, csn(c1))
  elsni(cv(s0), c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c3, cc))
  oveq2d(csu(s0, c0, c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c3, cc))
  sumsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumsplitsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2)=(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]c3))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]c3), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  fsumsplitf(s0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2, c0, { c1 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, (c0 ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd((c0 ⋃ { c1 }), w0)
  sylancl(w0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 })∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin, { c1 } ∈ Fin)
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, { c1 })
  pm2.61dan((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })), c2 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c0)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }))∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ ℂ, w0, s0 = c1)
  simpll(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), ¬ s0 ∈ c0)
  adantll(w0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), ¬ s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1)
  syl((s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0), s0 = c1, s0 ∈ { c1 })
  elunnel1(s0, c0, { c1 })
  elsni(s0, c1)
  eqeltrd(c2, cc, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 = c1))
  adantl(w0, s0 = c1, c2 = c3)
  adantr(w0, s0 = c1, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  oveq2d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)= c3, c1 ∈ c4, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  sumsnf(s0, c1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: sumsn
blocks.content: A sum of a singleton is the term. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: fsum1
blocks.content: The finite sum of ` A ( k ) ` from ` k = M ` to ` M ` (i.e. a sum with only one term) is ` B ` i.e. ` A ( M ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 8-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsum1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2), c1, csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)))
  sumeq1d(s0, co(c0, cfz, c0), c2, csn(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cc), wceq(co(c0, cfz, c0), csn(c0)))
  fzsn(c0)
  sumsn(s0, c0, cz, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsum1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)→ sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c0), c2)= c1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c2 = c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c0), c2), c1, sum(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  sumeq1d(s0, (c0[...]c0), c2, { c0 }, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ))
  adantr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℂ, (c0[...]c0)= { c0 })
  fzsn(c0)
  sumsn(s0, c0, cz, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sumpr
blocks.content: A sum over a pair is the sum of the elements. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 12-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c1, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2), co(c3, caddc, c4), co(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c2, csn(c0), csn(c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), emptycls), wne(c0, c1))
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1))))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cpr(c0, c1), cfn))
  prfi(c0, c1)
  r19.21bi(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  mpbird(w0, wral(s0, cpr(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc)))
  syl(w0, wb(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cc)), wa(wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc))), wa(wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c1, c6)))
  ralprg(s0, c0, c5, c1, c6, wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc))
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c4, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  oveq12d(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), c3), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c3, cc))
  simpld(w0, wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c1, c6))
  simpld(w0, wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c4, cc))
  sumsn(s0, c0, c5, c3, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c1), c2), c4), wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c4, cc))
  simprd(w0, wcel(c1, c6), wcel(c0, c5))
  simprd(w0, wcel(c4, cc), wcel(c3, cc))
  sumsn(s0, c1, c6, c4, c2)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, cc)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c4, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sumpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2)=(c3[+]c4))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c2 = c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c1 ∈ c6))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2), (c3[+]c4), (sum(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2)[+]sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, { c0, c1 }, c2, { c0 }, { c1 }, w0)
  syl(w0, ({ c0 } ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, c0 ≠ c1)
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1 } =({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1 } ∈ Fin)
  prfi(c0, c1)
  r19.21bi(s0, { c0, c1 }, w0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  mpbird(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2 ∈ ℂ), (c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ ℂ))
  syl(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c2 ∈ ℂ)↔(c3 ∈ ℂ ∧ c4 ∈ ℂ)), (c0 ∈ c5 ∧ c1 ∈ c6))
  ralprg(s0, c0, c5, c1, c6, c2 ∈ ℂ, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c3, s0 = c0)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c4, s0 = c1)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ { c0 }, c2)= c3, c0 ∈ c5, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  simpld(w0, c0 ∈ c5, c1 ∈ c6)
  simpld(w0, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ ℂ)
  sumsn(s0, c0, c5, c3, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ { c1 }, c2)= c4, c1 ∈ c6, c4 ∈ ℂ)
  simprd(w0, c1 ∈ c6, c0 ∈ c5)
  simprd(w0, c4 ∈ ℂ, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  sumsn(s0, c1, c6, c4, c2)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, cc)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c4, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: sumtp
blocks.content: A sum over a triple is the sum of the elements. (Contributed by AV, 24-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumtp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, c6)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c3, c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wceq(c3, c6))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c4, cc), wcel(c5, cc), wcel(c6, cc)))
  -| wi(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c7), wcel(c1, c8), wcel(c2, c9)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(co(c4, caddc, c5), caddc, c6), co(csu(s0, cpr(c0, c1), c3), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c2), c3)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), c3, cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c2, cpr(c0, c1))))
  nelprd(c2, c0, c1, w0)
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  necomd(c2, c1, w0)
  disjsn(cpr(c0, c1), c2)
  a1i(w0, wceq(ctp(c0, c1, c2), cun(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2))))
  df-tp(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(w0, wcel(ctp(c0, c1, c2), cfn))
  tpfi(c0, c1, c2)

  mpbird(w0, wral(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), wcel(c3, cc)), w3a(wcel(c4, cc), wcel(c5, cc), wcel(c6, cc)))

thm sumtp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, c3)=((c4[+]c5)[+]c6))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c3 = c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 → c3 = c5)
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 → c3 = c6)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c4 ∈ ℂ ∧ c5 ∈ ℂ ∧ c6 ∈ ℂ))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c7 ∧ c1 ∈ c8 ∧ c2 ∈ c9))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ≠ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, c9)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, c3), ((c4[+]c5)[+]c6), (sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c3)[+]sum(s0 ∈ { c2 }, c3)), w0)
  fsumsplit(s0, { c0, c1, c2 }, c3, { c0, c1 }, { c2 }, w0)
  sylibr(w0, ({ c0, c1 } ⋂ { c2 })= ∅, ¬ c2 ∈ { c0, c1 })
  nelprd(c2, c0, c1, w0)
  necomd(c2, c0, w0)
  necomd(c2, c1, w0)
  disjsn({ c0, c1 }, c2)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1, c2 } =({ c0, c1 } ⋃ { c2 }))
  df-tp(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(w0, { c0, c1, c2 } ∈ Fin)
  tpfi(c0, c1, c2)
  r19.21bi(s0, { c0, c1, c2 }, w0, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  mpbird(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, c3 ∈ ℂ), (c4 ∈ ℂ ∧ c5 ∈ ℂ ∧ c6 ∈ ℂ))
  syl(w0, (∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, c3 ∈ ℂ)↔(c4 ∈ ℂ ∧ c5 ∈ ℂ ∧ c6 ∈ ℂ)), (c0 ∈ c7 ∧ c1 ∈ c8 ∧ c2 ∈ c9))
  raltpg(s0, c0, c7, c1, c8, c2, c9, c3 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ ℂ, c5 ∈ ℂ, c6 ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d(c3, cc, c4, s0 = c0)
  eleq1d(c3, cc, c5, s0 = c1)
  eleq1d(c3, cc, c6, s0 = c2)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, c3), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ { c2 }, c3), (c4[+]c5), c6, w0)
  sumpr(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, c7, c8, w0)
  syl(w0, (c4 ∈ ℂ ∧ c5 ∈ ℂ), (c4 ∈ ℂ ∧ c5 ∈ ℂ ∧ c6 ∈ ℂ))
  3simpa(c4 ∈ ℂ, c5 ∈ ℂ, c6 ∈ ℂ)
  syl(w0, (c0 ∈ c7 ∧ c1 ∈ c8), (c0 ∈ c7 ∧ c1 ∈ c8 ∧ c2 ∈ c9))
  3simpa(c0 ∈ c7, c1 ∈ c8, c2 ∈ c9)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ { c2 }, c3)= c6, c2 ∈ c9, c6 ∈ ℂ)
  simp3d(w0, c2 ∈ c9, c0 ∈ c7, c1 ∈ c8)
  simp3d(w0, c6 ∈ ℂ, c4 ∈ ℂ, c5 ∈ ℂ)
  sumsn(s0, c2, c9, c6, c3)
  diff.ctp.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)

  eqtr3d(cin(csn(c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)), emptycls, cin(co(c0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)), w0)
  ineq1d(co(c0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1), csn(c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)), emptycls), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  ltp1d(c0, w0)
  zred(c0, w0)
  fzdisj(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c0, c1)
  eqtrd(co(c0, cfz, c1), cun(csn(c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)), cun(co(c0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfz, c1), cun(co(c0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1))), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  fzsplit(c0, c0, c1)
  uneq1d(co(c0, cfz, c0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1), csn(c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfz, c0), csn(c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  fzsn(c0)
  fzfid(c0, c1, w0)
  oveq1d(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), caddc, csu(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1), c2), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c0), c2), c3), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzel2(c1, c0)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, co(c0, cfz, c1), w0, wcel(c3, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c3, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  ralrimiva(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzfz1(c1, c0)
  sumsn(s0, c0, cz, c3, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c1)

  diff.nat1.s(s0)

  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)

}

blocks.name: fsummsnunz
blocks.content: A finite sum all of whose summands are integers is itself an integer (case where the summation set is the union of a finite set and a singleton). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsummsnunz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wcel(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), cz))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqel(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2), cz, csu(hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  fsumzcl(hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  imp(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cz)))
  expcom(wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cz))
  rspcsbela(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1)), c2, cz)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c2, cz))))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsummsnunz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ))→ sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2)∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl5eqel(sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2), cz, sum(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }),[hs0 / s0]c2), (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  fsumzcl(hs0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 }), [hs0 / s0]c2, (c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  syldan(c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0 ⋃ { c1 })∈ Fin, { c1 } ∈ Fin)
  a1i((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ)), { c1 } ∈ Fin)
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, { c1 })
  imp((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ)), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℤ)
  adantl(c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ), (hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 })→[hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℤ))
  expcom(∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℤ)
  rspcsbela(s0, hs0, (c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2, cz)
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋃ { c1 }))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ { c1 }), c2 ∈ ℤ)))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumsplitsnun
blocks.content: Separate out a term in a finite sum by splitting the sum into two parts. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Sep-2018.) (Revised by AV, 17-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsplitsnun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wceq(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3), co(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csb(s0, c1, c3))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3), co(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csb(s0, c1, c3)), co(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c3)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  3eqtr4g(csu(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3), co(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c3)), csu(hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), co(csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), caddc, csu(hs0, csn(c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  fsumsplit(hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), c0, csn(c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls))
  adantl(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls))
  sylbb2(wnel(c1, c0), wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
  df-nel(c1, c0)
  disjsn(c0, c1)
  eqidd(cun(c0, csn(c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(cun(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(csn(c1), cfn))
  snfi(c1)
  unfi(c0, csn(c1))
  zcnd(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1)))))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cz))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cz)))
  expcom(wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), cz))
  rspcsbela(s0, cv(hs0), cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3, cz)
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  oveq12i(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c3), csu(hs0, c0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), csu(hs0, csn(c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, c0, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, csn(c1), c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcv(hs0, c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  oveq2d(csu(s0, c0, c3), caddc, csu(s0, csn(c1), c3), csb(s0, c1, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wceq(csu(s0, csn(c1), c3), csb(s0, c1, c3)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(csb(s0, c1, c3), cc))
  simp2l(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)))
  zcnd(csb(s0, c1, c3), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wcel(csb(s0, c1, c3), cz), wcel(c1, cun(c0, csn(c1))), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))), wcel(c1, cun(c0, csn(c1))), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  adantr(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0), wcel(c1, csn(c1)))
  snidg(c1, c2)
  elun2(c1, csn(c1), c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz)))
  rspcsbela(s0, c1, cun(c0, csn(c1)), c3, cz)
  sumsns(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c0, csn(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wnel(c1, c0)), wral(s0, cun(c0, csn(c1)), wcel(c3, cz))))
  diff.cun.s(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: fsump1
blocks.content: The addition of the next term in a finite sum of ` A ( k ) ` is the current term plus ` B ` i.e. ` A ( N + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsump1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c2), co(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), caddc, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(c1, caddc, nat1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, co(c1, caddc, nat1)), c2), co(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), caddc, c3), co(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), c2), caddc, c3), w0)
  fsumm1(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  peano2uz(c1, c0)
  oveq1d(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), c2), caddc, c3, csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), w0)
  sumeq1d(s0, co(c0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)), c2, co(c0, cfz, c1), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), c1, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), c1), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  zcnd(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzelz(c1, c0)
  ax-1cn()
  pncan(c1, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, co(co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c1, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isumclim
blocks.content: An infinite sum equals the value its series converges to. (Contributed by NM, 25-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isumclim(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2, cfv(cli, cseq(c3, caddc, c4)), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c3, caddc, c4)), c2), wfun(cli), wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cli, c2))
  ax-mp(wfun(cli), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, cdm(cli), cc)
  funbrfv(cli, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isumclim(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c4 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c4))[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, (~~> ` seq(c3(+, c4))), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0)
  mpsyl(w0, (~~> ` seq(c3(+, c4)))= c2, Fun(~~>), seq(c3(+, c4))[~~>]c2)
  ax-mp(Fun(~~>), (~~> : dom(~~>)→ ℂ))
  fclim()
  ffun(cli, dom(~~>), cc)
  funbrfv(cli, seq(c3(+, c4)), c2)
}

blocks.name: isumclim2
blocks.content: A converging series converges to its infinite sum. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isumclim2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, csu(s0, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3))

} = {

  sylib(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, cfv(cli, cseq(c0, caddc, c1))), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  climdm(cseq(c0, caddc, c1))

}

  syl5eqr(csu(s0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s1)), c2), cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, cmpt(s0, c1, c2)), cv(s1)), csu(hs0, co(c3, cfz, cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
