thm isumclim3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s1)= sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]s1), c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (~~> ` c0), w0)
  sylib(w0, c0[~~>](~~> ` c0), c0 ∈ dom(~~>))
  climdm(c0)
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (~~> ` c0), (~~> ` seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), w0)
  syl5eqr(sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (~~> ` seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), sum(hs0 ∈ c1,((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)), w0)
  sumfc(hs0, s0, c1, c2)
  isum(hs0, c1, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), c3, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), w0)
  eqidd(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  3eqtr4g((~~> ` seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))), (~~> ` c0), iota(hs1, seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))[~~>]hs1), iota(hs1, c0[~~>]hs1), w0)
  iotabidv(hs1, w0, seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))[~~>]hs1, c0[~~>]hs1)
  climeq(s1, seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))), hs1, c0, c1, c3, universe, dom(~~>), w0)
  a1i(w0, seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex(c3, caddc, (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  eqtr2d((seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))` s1), (c0 ` s1), sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]s1), c2), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  syl5eqr(sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]s1), c2), (seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)))` s1), sum(hs0 ∈(c3[...]s1),((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  eqtri(sum(hs0 ∈(c3[...]s1),((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)), sum(s0 ∈(c3[...]s1), c2), sum(hs0 ∈(c3[...]s1),((s0 ∈(c3[...]s1)↦ c2)` hs0)))
  sumeq2i(hs0, (c3[...]s1), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), ((s0 ∈(c3[...]s1)↦ c2)` hs0))
  syl5reqr(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), ((s0 ∈(c3[...]s1)↦ c2)` hs0), (((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|`(c3[...]s1))` hs0), hs0 ∈(c3[...]s1))
  fveq1i(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|`(c3[...]s1)), hs0, (s0 ∈(c3[...]s1)↦ c2))
  ax-mp(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)|`(c3[...]s1))=(s0 ∈(c3[...]s1)↦ c2), (c3[...]s1)⊆ c1)
  sseqtr4i((c3[...]s1), c1, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  fzssuz(c3, s1)
  resmpt(s0, (c3[...]s1), c1, c2)
  fvres(hs0, (c3[...]s1), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))
  sumfc(hs0, s0, (c3[...]s1), c2)
  fsumser(hs0, c3, s1, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), (s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  eqidd(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0), ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 ∈(c3[...]s1)))
  syl6eleq(s1, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  simpr(w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  syl2an((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈(c3[...]s1), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)` hs0)∈ ℂ, w0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  simpl(w0, s1 ∈ c1)

  fmpttd(s0, c1, c2, cc, w0)
  df-fv(hs1, cli, seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))))
  df-fv(hs1, cli, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.cc.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.c((c3[...]s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cfz, s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))
  diff.hs1.c(seq(c3(+,(s0 ∈ c1 ↦ c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(cli)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: sumnul
blocks.content: The sum of a non-convergent infinite series evaluates to the empty set. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 4-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm sumnul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), emptycls))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), emptycls), wn(wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli))))
  ndmfv(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cli)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm sumnul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= ∅)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), emptycls, (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3)))= ∅, ¬ seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ndmfv(seq(c2(+, c3)), cli)
}

blocks.name: isumcl
blocks.content: The sum of a converging infinite series is a complex number. (Contributed by NM, 13-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cc))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cc, cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, wcel(cfv(cli, cseq(c2, caddc, c3)), cc), wf(cli, cdm(cli), cc), wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))
  fclim()
  ffvelrn(cli, cdm(cli), cc, cseq(c2, caddc, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), cc, (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3))), w0)
  isum(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  sylancr(w0, (~~> ` seq(c2(+, c3)))∈ ℂ, (~~> : dom(~~>)→ ℂ), seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  fclim()
  ffvelrn(cli, dom(~~>), cc, seq(c2(+, c3)))
}

blocks.name: isummulc2
blocks.content: An infinite sum multiplied by a constant. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isummulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmul, csu(s0, c1, c2)), csu(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cdm(cli)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5reqr(co(c0, cmul, csu(s0, c1, c2)), csu(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2)), csu(hs0, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cv(hs0))), w0)
  sumfc(hs0, s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2))
  isumclim(hs0, c1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cv(hs0)), co(c0, cmul, csu(s0, c1, c2)), c3, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2)), w0)
  eqidd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c1, cmpt(s0, c1, co(c0, cmul, c2)), cc, w0)

thm isummulc2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[×]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c0[×]c2)))

  ⊣ d(s0, c4)

  eleq1d((c4 ` s0), cc, (c4 ` hs0), s0 = hs0)
  mpan9(w0, hs0 ∈ c1, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[×]c2))` hs0)=(c0[×](c4 ` hs0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c1,((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[×]c2))` s0)=(c0[×](c4 ` s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[×]c2))` s0)=(c0[×](c4 ` s0)))
  eqtr4d(((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[×]c2))` s0), (c0[×](c4 ` s0)), (c0[×]c2), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[×]c2))` s0)=(c0[×]c2), s0 ∈ c1, (c0[×]c2)∈ 𝕌)

  nfeq1(s0, ((s0 ∈ c1 ↦(c0[×]c2))` hs0), (c0[×](c4 ` hs0)))

blocks.content: The sum of a converging infinite real series is a real number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)

thm isumrecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  climrecl(hs0, csu(s0, c0, c1), c0, c2, cseq(c2, caddc, c3), w0)
  isumclim2(s0, c2, c3, c0, c1, w0)
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c0, cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c2, c3, c0, w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csu(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c2, caddc, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm isumge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c2, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))

  syl5eq(csu(hs0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), w0)
  cbvsumv(hs0, s0, c0, cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c3)

thm isumge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c3 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c2(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ 0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ` hs0)), w0)
  iserge0(s0, sum(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ` hs0)), c0, c2, c3, w0)
  breqtrrd(seq(c2(+, c3)), cli, sum(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ` hs0)), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), w0)

  recnd(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  eqeltrd((c3 ` s0), cr, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  breqtrrd(nat0, cle, (c3 ` s0), c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl5eq(sum(hs0 ∈ c0,(c3 ` hs0)), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c3 ` s0)), w0)
  cbvsumv(hs0, s0, c0, (c3 ` hs0), (c3 ` s0))
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c3)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (c3 ` s0), c1, w0)

thm isumadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[+]c2))=(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  ⊣ c0 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c4 ` s0)= c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c5 ` s0)= c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c4))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c5))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  isumclim(s0, c0, (c1[+]c2), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), c3, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0))), w0)
  eqtrd(((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0)))` s0), (c1[+]c2), ((c4 ` s0)[+](c5 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0)))` s0)=((c4 ` s0)[+](c5 ` s0)))
  oveq12d((c4 ` s0), caddc, (c5 ` s0), c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  addcld(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  climadd(hs1, seq(c3(+,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0))))), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), c0, c3, seq(c3(+, c4)), universe, seq(c3(+, c5)), w0)
  isumclim2(s0, c3, c4, c0, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, seq(c3(+,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0)))))∈ 𝕌)
  seqex(c3, caddc, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0))))
  isumclim2(s0, c3, c5, c0, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs1, c0, seq(c3(+, c4)), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c4, c0, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs1, c0, seq(c3(+, c5)), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c5, c0, w0)
  seradd(s0, c3, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0))), hs1, c4, c5, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  syl6eleq(hs1, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c0, (w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0))
  simpr(w0, hs1 ∈ c0)
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧ s0 ∈(c3[...]hs1)), (c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrd((c4 ` s0), cc, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧ s0 ∈(c3[...]hs1)), (c5 ` s0)∈ ℂ, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  simpll(w0, hs1 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs1))
  eqeltrd((c5 ` s0), cc, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  syl(((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)∧ s0 ∈(c3[...]hs1)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0)))` s0)=((c4 ` s0)[+](c5 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c0)
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs1), s0 ∈ c0)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs1))
  elfzuz(s0, c3, hs1)
  fvmpt(hs0, s0, c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0))), ((c4 ` s0)[+](c5 ` s0)), ((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0)))
  oveq12d((c4 ` hs0), caddc, (c5 ` hs0), (c4 ` s0), (c5 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c4)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c5)

  ovex((c4 ` s0), caddc, (c5 ` s0))

  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(((c4 ` s0)[+](c5 ` s0)))
  diff.hs1.c(seq(c3(+,(hs0 ∈ c0 ↦((c4 ` hs0)[+](c5 ` hs0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

  diff.hs1.c(seq(c3(+, c5)))

  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm sumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

thm sumsplit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2)=(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ⋂ c1)= ∅)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c5 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c6 ` s0)= if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c4(+, c5))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c4(+, c6))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr4d(sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0)), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2)= sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0)), (c0 ⋃ c1)⊆ c3, ∀(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2 ∈ ℂ), (c3 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` c4)∨ c3 ∈ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s0, (c0 ⋃ c1), w0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  sumss2(s0, (c0 ⋃ c1), c3, c2, c4)
  3eqtr4rd((sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0)), sum(s0 ∈ c3,(if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0))), (sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0))[+]sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0))), w0)
  isumadd(s0, c3, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), c4, c5, c6, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)∈ ℂ)
  pm2.61dan(w0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c0)
  eqeltrd(if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), cc, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, ¬ s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)∈ ℂ)
  syl6eqel(if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), cc, nat0, ¬ s0 ∈ c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)∈ ℂ)
  sumeq2sdv(s0, c3, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0), (if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), w0)
  pm2.61dan(w0, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0)=(if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), s0 ∈ c0)
  3eqtr4rd(if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0), (if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), (c2[+]0), c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  addid1d(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  oveq12d(if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), caddc, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), c2, nat0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)= c2)
  iftrue(c2, nat0, s0 ∈ c0)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)= 0, ¬ s0 ∈ c1)

  sylibr(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 → ¬ s0 ∈ c1), ¬(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  mtbii(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), s0 ∈ ∅)
  noel(s0)

  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0)= c2)
  syl(s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0)= c2, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1))
  iftrue(c2, nat0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1))
  3eqtr4rd(if(s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), c2, 0), (if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), (0[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), (w0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, ¬ s0 ∈ c0, (0[+]if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0))= if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0))
  addid2d(if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), w0)
  pm2.61dan(w0, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c1)
  eqeltrd(if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), cc, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c1, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)= c2)
  iftrue(c2, nat0, s0 ∈ c1)
  adantl(w0, ¬ s0 ∈ c1, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)∈ ℂ)
  syl6eqel(if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), cc, nat0, ¬ s0 ∈ c1)
  iffalse(c2, nat0, s0 ∈ c1)
  0cn()
  oveq1d(if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0), caddc, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0), nat0, (w0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantl(w0, ¬ s0 ∈ c0, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)= 0)
  iffalse(c2, nat0, s0 ∈ c0)
  ifbid(c2, nat0, (w0 ∧ ¬ s0 ∈ c0), s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), s0 ∈ c1)
  adantl(w0, ¬ s0 ∈ c0, (s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1)↔ s0 ∈ c1))
  syl6rbbr(¬ s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1), s0 ∈ c1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∨ s0 ∈ c1))
  biorf(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1)
  elun(s0, c0, c1)
  oveq12d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)), sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), w0)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)= sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c0, c2, 0)), c0 ⊆ c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℂ), (c3 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` c4)∨ c3 ∈ Fin))
  unssad(c0, c3, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1))
  elun1(s0, c0, c1)
  sumss2(s0, c0, c3, c2, c4)
  syl21anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)= sum(s0 ∈ c3, if(s0 ∈ c1, c2, 0)), c1 ⊆ c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ ℂ), (c3 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` c4)∨ c3 ∈ Fin))
  unssbd(c1, c3, c0, w0)
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈(c0 ⋃ c1))
  elun2(s0, c1, c0)
  orcd(w0, c3 ⊆(ℤ≥ ` c4), c3 ∈ Fin)

blocks.name: fsump1i
blocks.content: Optimized version of ~ fsump1 for making sums of a concrete number of terms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)

thm fsump1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(c5, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c7, caddc, c6), c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), c4))
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, co(c5, caddc, nat1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c5, caddc, nat1), c1), wcel(c5, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  syl6eleqr(co(c5, caddc, nat1), c1, cfv(cuz, c2), wcel(c5, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  peano2uz(c5, c2)
  3eqtrd(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), c4, co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), caddc, c6), co(c7, caddc, c6), w0)
  syl5eq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3), co(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), caddc, c6), csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1)), c3), w0)
  sumeq1i(s0, co(c2, cfz, c0), c3, co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1)))
  oveq2i(c2, cfz, c0, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  fsump1(s0, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  syl6eleq(c5, cfv(cuz, c2), c1, w0)
  simpld(w0, wcel(c5, c1), wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), c7))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c1, cfv(cuz, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c2, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  sylbir(wceq(cv(s0), co(c5, caddc, nat1)), wceq(c3, c6), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2i(cv(s0), c0, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  oveq1d(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), caddc, c6, c7, w0)
  simprd(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c2, cfz, c5), c3), c7), wcel(c5, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, co(c5, caddc, nat1))
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c5, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

thm fsump1i(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c0), c3)= c4))
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(c5[+]1)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c3 = c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c5 ∈ c1 ∧ sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c5), c3)= c7))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c7[+]c6)= c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ c1, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c0), c3)= c4)
  syl5eqel(c0, c1, (c5[+]1), w0)
  syl(w0, (c5[+]1)∈ c1, c5 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))
  syl6eleqr((c5[+]1), c1, (ℤ≥ ` c2), c5 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c2))
  peano2uz(c5, c2)
  3eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c0), c3), c4, (sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c5), c3)[+]c6), (c7[+]c6), w0)
  syl5eq(sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c0), c3), (sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c5), c3)[+]c6), sum(s0 ∈(c2[...](c5[+]1)), c3), w0)
  sumeq1i(s0, (c2[...]c0), c3, (c2[...](c5[+]1)))
  oveq2i(c2, cfz, c0, (c5[+]1))
  fsump1(s0, c2, c5, c3, c6, w0)
  syl6eleq(c5, (ℤ≥ ` c2), c1, w0)
  simpld(w0, c5 ∈ c1, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c5), c3)= c7)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c2[...](c5[+]1)), c3 ∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c1)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c1, (ℤ≥ ` c2), s0 ∈(c2[...](c5[+]1)))
  elfzuz(s0, c2, (c5[+]1))
  sylbir(s0 =(c5[+]1), c3 = c6, s0 = c0)
  eqeq2i(s0, c0, (c5[+]1))
  oveq1d(sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c5), c3), caddc, c6, c7, w0)
  simprd(w0, sum(s0 ∈(c2[...]c5), c3)= c7, c5 ∈ c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cfz, (c5[+]1))
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c5, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

thm fsum2dlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {

  -| wi(wceq(cv(s4), cop(cv(s0), cv(s3))), wceq(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s3), c0))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cun(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))), c3))
  -| wb(w1, wceq(csu(s0, cv(s1), csu(s3, c0, c1)), csu(s4, ciun(s0, cv(s1), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c0)), c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)

  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

blocks.name: fsum2d
blocks.content: Write a double sum as a sum over a two-dimensional region. Note that ` B ( j ) ` is a function of ` j ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsum2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3)), wss(c0, c0))
  ssid(c0)

thm fsum2d(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3))
  ⊣ (s2 = < s0, s1 > → c3 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpi(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3), c0 ⊆ c0)

blocks.name: fsumxp
blocks.content: Combine two sums into a single sum over the cartesian product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c3, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s2, cxp(c0, c1), c3), csu(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3), w0)
  fsum2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  sumeq1i(s2, ciun(s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1)), c3, cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s0)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, csn(cv(s0)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumxp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s2 ∈(c0 × c1), c3))
  ⊣ (s2 = < s0, s1 > → c3 = c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2)), sum(s2 ∈(c0 × c1), c3), sum(s2 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3), w0)
  fsum2d(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  sumeq1i(s2, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0,({ s0 } × c1)), c3, (c0 × c1))
  iunxpconst(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.ciun.s(s2, s0, c0, ({ s0 } × c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s2, { s0 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s2, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fsumcnv
blocks.content: Transform a region of summation by using the converse operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s1, ccnv(c0), c2)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cop(cv(s3), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

thm fsumcnv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2))
  ⊣ (s0 = < s2, s3 > → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ (s1 = < s3, s2 > → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → Rel(c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= sum(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2)), d(s0, c2))
  syl6eqr(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2), sum(s1 ∈ `' c0,[(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3), w0)
  fsumf1o(s0, s1, c0, c1, `' c0, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, (hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), w0)
  syl6eqr(c1, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, s0 = <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)
  csbeq1a(s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  csbie2(s2, s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1), c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1)
  syl5eqr(c3, [<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)> / s0]c1, [< s2, s3 > / s0]c1, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  csbie(s0, < s2, s3 >, c1, c3)
  opex(s2, s3)
  csbeq1d(s0, < s2, s3 >, c1, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  opeq12(s2, (2nd ` s1), s3, (1st ` s1))
  syl(w0, `' c0 ∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin)
  cnvfi(c0)
  mpbii(w0, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 ↔ c0), ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 ↔ `' `' c0))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }): `' c0 ↔ `' `' c0), Rel(`' c0))
  cnvf1o(hs0, `' c0)
  f1oeq3d((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), `' c0, `' `' c0, c0, w0)
  sylib(w0, `' `' c0 = c0, Rel(c0))
  dfrel2(c0)
  adantl(w0, s1 ∈ `' c0, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` s1)= <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)
  eqtrd(((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` s1), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>), s1 ∈ `' c0)
  fveq2d((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, s1 ∈ `' c0)
  syl(s1 ∈ `' c0, ((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 })` <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)= <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> ∈ `' c0)
  eqeltrrd(<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, `' c0, s1, s1 ∈ `' c0)
  id(s1 ∈ `' c0)
  fvmpt(hs0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, `' c0, (hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }), <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ⋃ `' { hs0 })
  syl6eq(⋃ `' { hs0 }, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, ⋃ `' { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  unieqd(`' { hs0 }, `' { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  cnveqd({ hs0 }, { <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> }, hs0 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  sneq(hs0, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  opswap((1st ` s1), (2nd ` s1))
  eqid((hs0 ∈ `' c0 ↦ ⋃ `' { hs0 }))
  opex((2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  sumeq2i(s1, `' c0, c2, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3)
  syl6eqr(c2, [(2nd ` s1)/ s2][(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 ∈ `' c0)
  syl(s1 ∈ `' c0, c2 =[<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  mpan(s1 ∈ `' c0, s1 = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, Rel(`' c0))
  relcnv(c0)
  1st2nd(`' c0, s1)
  csbeq1a(s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, c2)
  csbie2(s2, s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1), c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2)
  fvex(c2nd, s1)
  fvex(c1st, s1)
  syl5eqr(c3, [<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)> / s1]c2, [< s3, s2 > / s1]c2, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  csbie(s1, < s3, s2 >, c2, c3)
  opex(s3, s2)
  csbeq1d(s1, < s3, s2 >, c2, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, (s2 =(2nd ` s1)∧ s3 =(1st ` s1)))
  ancoms(s2 =(2nd ` s1), s3 =(1st ` s1), < s3, s2 > = <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  opeq12(s3, (1st ` s1), s2, (2nd ` s1))
  diff.csb.s(s0, s2, (2nd ` s1), [(1st ` s1)/ s3]c3)
  diff.csb.s(s0, s3, (1st ` s1), c3)
  diff.cop.s(s0, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2nd, s1)
  diff.c2nd.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1st, s1)
  diff.c1st.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, hs0, `' c0, ⋃ `' { hs0 })
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s1, `' { hs0 })
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, { hs0 })
  diff.csn.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s2, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  diff.csb.s(s3, s0, <(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>, c1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, (2nd ` s1), (1st ` s1))
  diff.cop.s(s0, s2, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.hs0.c(`' c0)
  diff.hs0.c(<(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>)
  diff.hs0.c(<(2nd ` s1),(1st ` s1)>)
  diff.csb.s(s2, s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s2, (1st ` s1), (2nd ` s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c1st, s1)
  diff.c1st.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2nd, s1)
  diff.c2nd.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.csb.s(s3, s1, <(1st ` s1),(2nd ` s1)>, c2)
  diff.cop.s(s3, (1st ` s1), (2nd ` s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c1st, s1)
  diff.c1st.s(s3)
  diff.cfv.s(s3, c2nd, s1)
  diff.c2nd.s(s3)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cop.s(s1, s3, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)

blocks.name: fsumcom2
blocks.content: Interchange order of summation. Note that ` B ( j ) ` and ` D ( k ) ` are not necessarily constant expressions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 2-Aug-2021.)

thm fsumcom2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c3, csu(s0, c4, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c4))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

blocks.name: fsumcom
blocks.content: Interchange order of summation. (Contributed by NM, 15-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2014.)

thm fsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, csu(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cfn))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  ancom(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s1 ∈ c1, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)↔(s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)))
  ancom(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
}

thm fsum0diaglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))), diffss(s0, s1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  jca(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))

  mpbird(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wbr(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), cle, c0))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wbr(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), cle, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(s0)))
  elfzle1(cv(s0), nat0, c0)

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wbr(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), cle, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  zsubcld(c0, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  eluz(co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), c0)
  fzss2(c0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), nat0)

  lesubd(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  zred(cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  zred(c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  zred(cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))))

  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, nat0)))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), nat0, c0)

blocks.name: fsum0diag
blocks.content: Two ways to express "the sum of ` A ( j , k ) ` over the triangular region ` M <_ j ` , ` M <_ k ` , ` j + k <_ N ` ". (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsum0diag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c0), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), c1)), csu(s1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), csu(s0, co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))), c1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))), c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))), w0)
  fzfid(nat0, c0, w0)
  fzfid(nat0, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0))))
  a1i(w0, wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))))))
  impbii(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1))))))
  fsum0diaglem(s0, s1, c0)
  fsum0diaglem(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s1)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, cv(s1))
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, co(c0, cmin, cv(s0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, cv(s0))
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsum0diag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(0[...]c0), sum(s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0)), c1))= sum(s1 ∈(0[...]c0), sum(s0 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s1)), c1)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0))))→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, (0[...]c0), (0[...](c0[-]s0)), c1, (0[...]c0), (0[...](c0[-]s1)), w0)
  fzfid(nat0, c0, w0)
  fzfid(nat0, (c0[-]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(0[...]c0)))
  a1i(w0, ((s0 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0)))↔(s1 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s0 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s1)))))
  impbii((s0 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s1 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s0))), (s1 ∈(0[...]c0)∧ s0 ∈(0[...](c0[-]s1))))
  fsum0diaglem(s0, s1, c0)
  fsum0diaglem(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cfz, (c0[-]s1))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, s1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat0, cfz, (c0[-]s0))
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: mptfzshft
blocks.content: 1-1 onto function in maps-to notation which shifts a finite set of sequential integers. Formerly part of proof for ~ fsumshft . (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2019.)

thm mptfzshft(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wf1o(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wfn(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wfn(ccnv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), co(c0, cfz, c2)))

  fnmpti(s0, cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))
  ovex(cv(s0), cmin, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  mpbiri(w0, wfn(ccnv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wfn(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  fnmpti(hs0, cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1))
  ovex(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))
  fneq1d(ccnv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), co(c0, cfz, c2), cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)), w0)
  mptcnv(s0, hs0, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), co(c0, cfz, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), w0)
  impbida(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))))
  eqeltrrd(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), cv(s0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1))), wcel(c2, cz))
  eqeltrd(cv(hs0), cz, co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  zsubcld(cv(s0), c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  eqtr2d(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  oveq1d(cv(hs0), caddc, c1, co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, c1), caddc, c1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))
  ad2antrl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), cmin, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  elfzelz(cv(s0), co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1))

  eqeltrd(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1)))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c1), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cfz, co(c2, caddc, c1)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c2, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(c1, cz))

thm fsumrev(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

  fzfid(co(c3, cmin, c1), co(c3, cmin, c0), w0)
  f1od(s0, s1, cmpt(s0, co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)), universe, co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c3, cmin, cv(s0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)))))
  ovexd(c3, cmin, cv(s1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1))))

  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))
  eqeltrd(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))), wcel(co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wcel(co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)), co(c0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)))), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, cz))

  fzrev(c0, c1, c3, cv(s0))

  oveq2d(c3, cmin, cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))
  syl2an2r(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)))), wceq(co(c3, cmin, co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))
  elfzelz(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, c1), co(c3, cmin, c0))
  syl2an(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(c3, cmin, co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))), cv(s0)), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  nncan(c3, cv(s0))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))), wcel(co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)))), wcel(c1, cz))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)))), wcel(c3, cz))
  fzrev2(c0, c1, c3, cv(s1))
  eqtr2d(cv(s1), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)), co(c3, cmin, co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))))
  oveq2d(c3, cmin, cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))
  syl2an2r(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)))), wceq(co(c3, cmin, co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))
  elfzelz(cv(s1), c0, c1)
  syl2an(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wceq(co(c3, cmin, co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))), cv(s1)), wcel(c3, cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  zcn(c3)
  zcn(cv(s1))
  nncan(c3, cv(s1))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))), cv(s1)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1))))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(s1), co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), cmpt(s0, co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))), co(c3, cmin, cv(s1)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), c3, cmin)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0))))
  ovex(c3, cmin, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmin, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, co(co(c3, cmin, c1), cfz, co(c3, cmin, c0)), co(c3, cmin, cv(s0)))

blocks.name: fsumshft
blocks.content: Index shift of a finite sum. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 8-Sep-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumf1o(s0, s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), c4, co(cv(s1), cmin, c3), cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), w0)
  fzfid(co(c0, caddc, c3), co(c1, caddc, c3), w0)
  mptfzshft(s0, c0, c3, c1, w0)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3)))
  fvmpt(s0, cv(s1), co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)), co(cv(s1), cmin, c3), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(s1), cmin, c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3)))
  ovex(cv(s1), cmin, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), cmin, c3)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, co(co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3)), co(cv(s0), cmin, c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, caddc, c3)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmin, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, caddc, c3), cfz, co(c1, caddc, c3))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, caddc, c3)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumshft(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3)), c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[-]c3)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)

} = {

  eqid((s0 ∈((c0[+]c3)[...](c1[+]c3))↦(s0[-]c3)))

  diff.co.s(s1, (c0[+]c3), cfz, (c1[+]c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, caddc, c3)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, cmin, c3)

thm fsumshftm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(co(c0, cmin, c3), cfz, co(c1, cmin, c3)), c4)))

  fsumshft(hs0, s1, c0, c1, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cneg(c3), csb(s0, co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), c2), w0)
  znegcld(c3, w0)

  rspc(s0, cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c1), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc))
  nfel1(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), cc)

  eleq1d(c2, cc, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))

  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), c2)
  sumeq1d(s1, co(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c3)), cfz, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c3))), csb(s0, co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), c2), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), cfz, co(c1, cmin, c3)), w0)
  oveq12d(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c3)), cfz, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c3)), co(c0, cmin, c3), co(c1, cmin, c3), w0)
  negsubd(c0, c3, w0)
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  negsubd(c1, c3, w0)
  zcnd(c1, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s1, co(co(c0, cmin, c3), cfz, co(c1, cmin, c3)), csb(s0, co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), c2), c4, w0)
  syl6eq(csb(s0, co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), c2), c4, csb(s0, co(cv(s1), caddc, c3), c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), cfz, co(c1, cmin, c3)))))
  csbeq1d(s0, co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), c2, co(cv(s1), caddc, c3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), cfz, co(c1, cmin, c3)))))
  syl2anr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), co(co(c0, cmin, c3), cfz, co(c1, cmin, c3))), wceq(co(cv(s1), cmin, cneg(c3)), co(cv(s1), caddc, c3)), wcel(cv(s1), cc), wcel(c3, cc))

  diff.hs0.s(s1)

  diff.co.s(s1, co(c0, caddc, cneg(c3)), cfz, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c3)))

  diff.caddc.s(s1)

thm fsumshftm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)), c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (s0 =(s1[+]c3)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eq(sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2), sum(s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)), c4), sum(hs0 ∈(c0[...]c1),[hs0 / s0]c2), w0)
  cbvsumi(s0, hs0, (c0[...]c1), c2, [hs0 / s0]c2)
  nfcv(hs0, c2)
  3eqtrd(sum(hs0 ∈(c0[...]c1),[hs0 / s0]c2), sum(s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)), c4), sum(s1 ∈((c0[+]-u(c3))[...](c1[+]-u(c3))),[(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2), sum(s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)),[(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2), w0)
  fsumshft(hs0, s1, c0, c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, -u(c3), [(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2, w0)
  znegcld(c3, w0)
  mpan9(w0, hs0 ∈(c0[...]c1), [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ, ∀(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2 ∈ ℂ))
  ralrimiva(s0, (c0[...]c1), w0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  rspc(s0, hs0, (c0[...]c1), c2 ∈ ℂ, [hs0 / s0]c2 ∈ ℂ)
  nfel1(s0, [hs0 / s0]c2, cc)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, [hs0 / s0]c2, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, (s1[-]-u(c3)), c2)
  sumeq1d(s1, ((c0[+]-u(c3))[...](c1[+]-u(c3))), [(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2, ((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)), w0)
  oveq12d((c0[+]-u(c3)), cfz, (c1[+]-u(c3)), (c0[-]c3), (c1[-]c3), w0)
  negsubd(c0, c3, w0)
  zcnd(c0, w0)
  negsubd(c1, c3, w0)
  zcnd(c1, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s1, ((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)), [(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2, c4, w0)
  syl6eq([(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2, c4, [(s1[+]c3)/ s0]c2, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3))))
  csbeq1d(s0, (s1[-]-u(c3)), c2, (s1[+]c3), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3))))
  syl2anr(w0, s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)), (s1[-]-u(c3))=(s1[+]c3), s1 ∈ ℂ, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  zcnd(s1, s1 ∈((c0[-]c3)[...](c1[-]c3)))
  elfzelz(s1, (c0[-]c3), (c1[-]c3))
  zcnd(c3, w0)
  subneg(s1, c3)
  csbie(s0, (s1[+]c3), c2, c4)
  ovex(s1, caddc, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[...]c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(-u(c3))
  diff.hs0.c([(s1[-]-u(c3))/ s0]c2)
  diff.csb.s(s1, s0, hs0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c0[+]-u(c3)), cfz, (c1[+]-u(c3)))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, -u(c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, caddc, -u(c3))
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s1, (c0[-]c3), cfz, (c1[-]c3))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cmin, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cmin, c3)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, s1, caddc, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumrev2
blocks.content: Reversal of a finite sum. (Contributed by NM, 27-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)

thm fsumrev2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, cv(s1))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane(co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls, w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c3)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls), wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c3)))
  3eqtr4a(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c3), csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, c3), wceq(co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls))
  eqtr4i(csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, c3), nat0)
  sum0(s0, c2)
  sum0(s1, c3)
  sumeq1(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls, c2)
  sumeq1(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls, c3)
  sylan2b(w0, wne(co(c0, cfz, c1), emptycls), wceq(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c3)), wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  fzn0(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c1), c2), csu(s1, co(c0, cfz, c1), c3), csu(s1, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cfz, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0)), c3), wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  fsumrev(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, co(c0, caddc, c1), c3, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  zaddcld(c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(c2, cc))
  sumeq1d(s1, co(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cfz, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0)), c3, co(c0, cfz, c1), wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  oveq12d(co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1), cfz, co(co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0), c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  pncand(c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  pncan2d(c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  zcnd(c0, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  eluzel2(c1, c0)
  zcnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c1, cz))
  eluzelz(c1, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, c1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)

  diff.co.s(s1, co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c0, caddc, c1), cmin, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, caddc, c1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cfz, c1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)

blocks.pretty:
thm fsumrev2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 ∈(c0[...]c1), c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c1))→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (s0 =((c0[+]c1)[-]s1)→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  pm2.61dane((c0[...]c1), emptycls, w0, sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 ∈(c0[...]c1), c3))
  adantl(w0, (c0[...]c1)= ∅, sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 ∈(c0[...]c1), c3))
  3eqtr4a(sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2), sum(s1 ∈(c0[...]c1), c3), sum(s0 ∈ ∅, c2), sum(s1 ∈ ∅, c3), (c0[...]c1)= ∅)
  eqtr4i(sum(s0 ∈ ∅, c2), sum(s1 ∈ ∅, c3), nat0)
  sum0(s0, c2)
  sum0(s1, c3)
  sumeq1(s0, (c0[...]c1), emptycls, c2)
  sumeq1(s1, (c0[...]c1), emptycls, c3)
  sylan2b(w0, (c0[...]c1)≠ ∅, sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2)= sum(s1 ∈(c0[...]c1), c3), c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  fzn0(c0, c1)
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈(c0[...]c1), c2), sum(s1 ∈(c0[...]c1), c3), sum(s1 ∈(((c0[+]c1)[-]c1)[...]((c0[+]c1)[-]c0)), c3), (w0 ∧ c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)))
  fsumrev(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, (c0[+]c1), c3, (w0 ∧ c1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)))

blocks.name: fsummulc1
blocks.content: A finite sum multiplied by a constant. (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsummulc1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, c2), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, c2), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(c2, cmul, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmul, c1)), w0)
  fsummulc2(s0, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  mulcomd(csu(s0, c0, c1), c2, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2), co(c2, cmul, c1), w0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, cc))
}

thm fsummulc1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[×]c2)= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[×]c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d((sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[×]c2), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[×]c2)), (c2[×]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c2[×]c1)), w0)
  fsummulc2(s0, c2, c0, c1, w0)
  mulcomd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), c2, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (c1[×]c2), (c2[×]c1), w0)
  mulcomd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
}

blocks.name: fsumneg
blocks.content: Negation of a finite sum. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)

thm fsumneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), cneg(csu(s0, c0, c1))))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))

} = {
  3eqtr3rd(csu(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), cneg(csu(s0, c0, c1)), co(cneg(nat1), cmul, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c1)), w0)

  a1i(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  mulm1d(csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, c1), cneg(c1), w0)
  mulm1d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  diff.nat1.s(s0)

thm fsumneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, -u(c1))= -u(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))

blocks.name: fsumsub
blocks.content: Split a finite sum over a subtraction. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c2)), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(csu(s0, c0, c2))), w0)
  eqtrd(csu(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(csu(s0, c0, c2))), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c0, cneg(c2))), w0)
  fsumadd(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), w0)
  negcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  oveq2d(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, csu(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), cneg(csu(s0, c0, c2)), w0)
  fsumneg(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negsubd(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[-]c2))=(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[-]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[-]c2)), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[-]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[+]-u(c2))), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]-u(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2))), w0)
  eqtrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c1[+]-u(c2))), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]-u(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2))), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈ c0, -u(c2))), w0)
  fsumadd(s0, c0, c1, -u(c2), w0)
  negcld(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  oveq2d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), caddc, sum(s0 ∈ c0, -u(c2)), -u(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)), w0)
  fsumneg(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (c1[+]-u(c2)), (c1[-]c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  negsubd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: fsum2mul

blocks.origin:
thm fsum2mul(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, co(c2, cmul, c3))), co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmul, csu(s1, c1, c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

thm fsum2mul(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1,(c2[×]c3)))=(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[×]sum(s1 ∈ c1, c3)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtr2d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1,(c2[×]c3))), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[×]sum(s1 ∈ c1, c3)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c2[×]sum(s1 ∈ c1, c3))), w0)
  fsummulc1(s0, c0, c2, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c3), w0)
  fsumcl(s1, c1, c3, w0)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (c2[×]sum(s1 ∈ c1, c3)), sum(s1 ∈ c1,(c2[×]c3)), w0)
  fsummulc2(s1, c2, c1, c3, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, c3 ∈ ℂ)
  diff.csu.s(s0, s1, c1, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  expimpd((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ), (# ` c0)∈ ℕ, ∃(hs0,(hs0 :(1[...](# ` c0))↔ c0)), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=((# ` c0)[×]c1))
  exlimdv(hs0, ((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧(# ` c0)∈ ℕ), (hs0 :(1[...](# ` c0))↔ c0), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)=((# ` c0)[×]c1))

  simpllr(c0 ∈ Fin, c1 ∈ ℂ, ((# ` c0)∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# ` c0))↔ c0)), s0 ∈ c0)
  syl2an(((c0 ∈ Fin ∧ c1 ∈ ℂ)∧((# ` c0)∈ ℕ ∧(hs0 :(1[...](# ` c0))↔ c0))), hs1 ∈(1[...](# ` c0)), ((ℕ × { c1 })` hs1)= c1, c1 ∈ ℂ, hs1 ∈ ℕ)

thm fsumdifsnconst(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmul, c2)))

  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), cmul, c2), co(cfv(chash, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cmul, c2), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cc)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cc)), wceq(csu(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), c2), co(cfv(chash, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cmul, c2)), wa(wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cc), wa(wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn), wcel(c2, cc)))
  anim1i(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cdif(c0, csn(c1)), cfn))

  fsumconst(s0, cdif(c0, csn(c1)), c2)
  oveq1d(cfv(chash, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), cmul, c2, co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cc)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(chash, cdif(c0, csn(c1))), co(cfv(chash, c0), cmin, nat1)))

blocks.name: modfsummod
blocks.content: A finite sum modulo a positive integer equals the finite sum of their summands modulo the positive integer, modulo the positive integer. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fsumge0
blocks.content: If all of the terms of a finite sum are nonnegative, so is the sum. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)

thm fsumge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  fsumcllem(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cc))
  sstri(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), cc, cr)
  rge0ssre()
  ax-resscn()
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(cv(hs1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  ge0addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sylanbrc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  elrege0(c1)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  0e0icopnf()
  simprbi(wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  elrege0(csu(s0, c0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat0, cico, cpnf)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diff.cico.s(s0)
  diff.cpnf.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(co(nat0, cico, cpnf))

  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: fsumless
blocks.content: A shorter sum of nonnegative terms is smaller than a longer one. (Contributed by NM, 26-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c2, c1), co(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, csu(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, co(csu(s0, c0, c1), caddc, csu(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1))), wbr(nat0, cle, csu(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1)))
  fsumge0(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1, w0)
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  addge01d(csu(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1), csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  ssfid(c0, c2, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sselda(cv(s0), c0, c2, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, cdif(c2, c0), c1, w0)
  sylancl(w0, wcel(cdif(c2, c0), cfn), wcel(c2, cfn), wss(cdif(c2, c0), c2))
  difss(c2, c0)
  ssfi(c2, cdif(c2, c0))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eldifi(cv(s0), c2, c0)
  fsumsplit(s0, c2, c1, c0, cdif(c2, c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cin(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), emptycls))
  disjdif(c0, c2)
  eqcomd(c2, cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cun(c0, cdif(c2, c0)), c2), wss(c0, c2))
  undif(c0, c2)
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→ 0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  breqtrrd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), cle, sum(s0 ∈ c2, c1), (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), c1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[≤](sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[+]sum(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), c1)), 0[≤]sum(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), c1))
  fsumge0(s0, (c2 \ c0), c1, w0)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), 0[≤]c1, s0 ∈ c2)
  addge01d(sum(s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  ssfid(c0, c2, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c2)
  sselda(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, (c2 \ c0), c1, w0)
  sylancl(w0, (c2 \ c0)∈ Fin, c2 ∈ Fin, (c2 \ c0)⊆ c2)
  difss(c2, c0)
  ssfi(c2, (c2 \ c0))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c2 \ c0), c1 ∈ ℝ, s0 ∈ c2)
  eldifi(s0, c2, c0)
  fsumsplit(s0, c2, c1, c0, (c2 \ c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, (c0 ⋂(c2 \ c0))= ∅)
  disjdif(c0, c2)
  eqcomd(c2, (c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0)), w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 ⋃(c2 \ c0))= c2, c0 ⊆ c2)
  undif(c0, c2)
  recnd(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c2, c0)
}

blocks.name: fsumge1
blocks.content: A sum of nonnegative numbers is greater than or equal to any one of its terms. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumge1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, csu(s0, c1, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(nat0, cle, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wceq(c2, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(c0, cle, csu(s0, c1, c2), csu(s0, csn(c3), c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(csu(s0, csn(c3), c2), c0), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c0, cc))
  rspcdva(s0, c3, c1, w0, wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc))
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  sumsn(s0, c3, c1, c0, c2)
  fsumless(s0, csn(c3), c2, c1, w0)
  snssd(c3, c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumge1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ 0[≤]c2)
  ⊣ (s0 = c3 → c2 = c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrrd(c0, cle, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), sum(s0 ∈ { c3 }, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, sum(s0 ∈ { c3 }, c2)= c0, c3 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ ℂ)
  rspcdva(s0, c3, c1, w0, c0 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  eleq1d(c2, cc, c0, s0 = c3)
  ralrimiva(s0, c1, w0, c2 ∈ ℂ)
  recnd(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  sumsn(s0, c3, c1, c0, c2)
  fsumless(s0, { c3 }, c2, c1, w0)
  snssd(c3, c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c3)
}

  3brtr3d([hs0 / s0]c1, cle, nat0, sum(s0 ∈ { hs0 }, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ((w0 ∧ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= 0)∧ hs0 ∈ c0))

  sylancl(((w0 ∧ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= 0)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ([hs0 / s0]c1 = 0 ↔([hs0 / s0]c1[≤]0 ∧ 0[≤][hs0 / s0]c1)), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℝ, 0 ∈ ℝ)
  simpld(((w0 ∧ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= 0)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), [hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℝ, 0[≤][hs0 / s0]c1)
  mpan9((w0 ∧ sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= 0), hs0 ∈ c0, ([hs0 / s0]c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤][hs0 / s0]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤]c1)))
  adantr(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= 0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤]c1)))
