blocks.name: fsumle
blocks.content: If all of the terms of finite sums compare, so do the sums. (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cle, csu(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  fsumge0(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  resubcld(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c2, cmin, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  subge0d(c2, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  subge0d(csu(s0, c0, c2), csu(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1[≤]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[≤]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), 0[≤](sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c2[-]c1)), w0)
  fsumge0(s0, c0, (c2[-]c1), w0)
  resubcld(c2, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), 0[≤](c2[-]c1), c1[≤]c2)
  subge0d(c2, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  recnd(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  subge0d(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
}

blocks.name: fsumlt
blocks.content: If every term in one finite sum is less than the corresponding term in another, then the first sum is less than the second. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), clt, csu(s0, c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(csu(s0, c0, c1), clt, csu(s0, c0, c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1))))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, co(csu(s0, c0, c2), cmin, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  rpgt0d(csu(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1)), w0)
  fsumrpcl(s0, c0, co(c2, cmin, c1), w0)
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), crp), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wb(wbr(c1, clt, c2), wcel(co(c2, cmin, c1), crp)), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  difrp(c1, c2)
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  posdifd(csu(s0, c0, c1), csu(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fsumlt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ≠ ∅)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1[<]c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)[<]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), 0[<](sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, (sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)[-]sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c2[-]c1)), w0)
  rpgt0d(sum(s0 ∈ c0,(c2[-]c1)), w0)
  fsumrpcl(s0, c0, (c2[-]c1), w0)
  mpbid((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c2[-]c1)∈ ℝ+, c1[<]c2)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c1[<]c2 ↔(c2[-]c1)∈ ℝ+), c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  difrp(c1, c2)
  fsumsub(s0, c0, c2, c1, w0)
  recnd(c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  recnd(c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  posdifd(sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2), w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  fsumrecl(s0, c0, c2, w0)
}

blocks.name: fsumabs
blocks.content: Generalized triangle inequality: the absolute value of a finite sum is less than or equal to the sum of absolute values. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumabs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cle, csu(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cle, csu(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1))), wss(c0, c0))
  ssid(c0)
  mpcom(w0, wi(wss(c0, c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cle, csu(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, wi(w0, wi(wss(c0, c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cle, csu(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(emptycls, c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, emptycls, c1)), cle, csu(s0, emptycls, cfv(cabs, c1))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, c1))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), cfv(cabs, c1))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1)))), wi(wss(emptycls, c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, emptycls, c1)), cle, csu(s0, emptycls, cfv(cabs, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1))), wss(emptycls, c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, emptycls, c1)), cle, csu(s0, emptycls, cfv(cabs, c1))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)
  breq12d(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1)), cfv(cabs, csu(s0, emptycls, c1)), csu(s0, emptycls, cfv(cabs, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  fveq2d(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csu(s0, emptycls, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)
  sumeq1(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls, cfv(cabs, c1))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1)))), wi(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, c1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1))), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, c1))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  breq12d(cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs0), c1)), cle, csu(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cabs, c1)), cfv(cabs, csu(s0, cv(hs1), c1)), csu(s0, cv(hs1), cfv(cabs, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))

blocks.name: telfsumo
blocks.content: Sum of a telescoping series, using half-open intervals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-May-2016.)

blocks.name: fsumre
blocks.content: The real part of a sum. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cre, csu(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  fsumrelem(s0, hs0, hs1, cre, c0, c1, w0)
  mp2an(wf(cre, cc, cc), wf(cre, cc, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  ref()
  ax-resscn()
  fss(cre, cc, cr, cc)
  readd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cre.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cre)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cre)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

  ⊢ (w0 →(Re ` sum(s0 ∈ c0, c1))= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(Re ` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  fsumrelem(s0, hs0, hs1, cre, c0, c1, w0)

  ref()
  ax-resscn()
  fss(cre, cc, cr, cc)
  readd(hs0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cre.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cre)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cre)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)

blocks.name: fsumrlim
blocks.content: Limit of a finite sum of converging sequences. Note that ` C ( k ) ` is a collection of functions with implicit parameter ` k ` , each of which converges to ` D ( k ) ` as ` n ~~> +oo ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumrlim(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), crli, csu(s1, c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wbr(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), crli, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

blocks.name: fsumo1
blocks.content: The finite sum of eventually bounded functions (where the index set ` B ` does not depend on ` x ` ) is eventually bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2016.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2016.)

blocks.name: o1fsum
blocks.content: If ` A ( k ) ` is O(1), then ` sum_ k <_ x , A ( k ) ` is O( ` x ` ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-May-2016.)

blocks.name: seqabs
blocks.content: Generalized triangle inequality: the absolute value of a finite sum is less than or equal to the sum of absolute values. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqabs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2)), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3brtr3d(cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2)), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2), cfv(cabs, csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), w0)
  fsumabs(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), w0)
  fzfid(c0, c2, w0)
  fveq2d(cabs, csu(s0, co(c0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), w0)
  fsumser(s0, c0, c2, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c1, w0)
  eqidd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  fsumser(s0, c0, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), c3, w0)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cc), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  recnd(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  abscl(cfv(c1, cv(s0)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c2)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iserabs
blocks.content: Generalized triangle inequality: the absolute value of an infinite sum is less than or equal to the sum of absolute values. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 10-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  climle(hs0, cfv(cabs, c0), c1, c2, c3, cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), cseq(c3, caddc, c5), w0)
  climabs(hs0, cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), c0, c2, c3, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), universe))
  mptex(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1))))
  fvexi(c2, cuz, c3)
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), cv(hs0)), cr, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  abscld(cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  abscld(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cv(hs0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), cv(hs0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs0)))))
  fvmpt(hs1, cv(hs0), c2, cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs0))), cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1))))
  2fveq3(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cabs, cseq(c3, caddc, c4))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))))
  fvex(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs0)))
  seqabs(s0, c3, c4, cv(hs0), c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c5, cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  syl6eleqr(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cabs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(hs1, c2, cfv(cabs, cfv(cseq(c3, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, caddc, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

thm iserabs(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(abs ` c0)[≤]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c4))[~~>]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c5))[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c5 ` s0)=(abs `(c4 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  climle(hs0, (abs ` c0), c1, c2, c3, (hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1))), seq(c3(+, c5)), w0)
  climabs(hs0, (hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1))), c0, c2, c3, seq(c3(+, c4)), universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, (hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1)))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(hs1, c2, (abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1)))
  fvexi(c2, cuz, c3)
  eqeltrd(((hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1)))` hs0), cr, (abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  abscld((seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c2, seq(c3(+, c4)), cc, w0)
  serf(s0, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c2, seq(c3(+, c5)), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  eqeltrd((c5 ` s0), cr, (abs `(c4 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  abscld((c4 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  eqbrtrd(((hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1)))` hs0), cle, (seq(c3(+, c5))` hs0), (abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0)), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, ((hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1)))` hs0)=(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0)))
  fvmpt(hs1, hs0, c2, (hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1))), (abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0)), (abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1)))
  2fveq3(hs1, hs0, cabs, seq(c3(+, c4)))
  eqid((hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1))))
  fvex(cabs, (seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0))
  seqabs(s0, c3, c4, hs0, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  syl6eleq(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ, s0 ∈ c2)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c5 ` s0)=(abs `(c4 ` s0)))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c5 ` s0)=(abs `(c4 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c2)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((abs ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((hs1 ∈ c2 ↦(abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c3(+, c5)))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c3(+, c4)))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((abs `(seq(c3(+, c4))` hs0)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cvgcmp
blocks.content: A comparison test for convergence of a real infinite series. Exercise 3 of [Gleason] p. 182. (Contributed by NM, 1-May-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2014.)

  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cdm(cli)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c3))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c3))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))

  mpd(w0, wral(hs0, crp, wrex(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, crp, wrex(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0)))))))

  syl2anc(w0, wral(hs0, crp, wrex(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cdm(cli)))

  ralimdva(hs0, crp, w0, wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  syl6an(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cc), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0))))), wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, c3), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cc)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, c3), wral(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cv(hs1)))), clt, cv(hs0)))))

blocks.name: cvgcmpub
blocks.content: An upper bound for the limit of a real infinite series. This theorem can also be used to compare two infinite series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cvgcmpub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cli, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, caddc, c6), cli, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c5, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), diffsc(s0, c4))
  climle(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cseq(c3, caddc, c6), cseq(c3, caddc, c5), w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c6), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c6, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c2, cseq(c3, caddc, c5), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  syl6eleq(c4, cfv(cuz, c3), c2, w0)
  eluzel2(c4, c3)
  serle(s0, c3, c6, cv(hs0), c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3), c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))

thm cvgcmpub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[≤]c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c5 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c6 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c5))[~~>]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c3(+, c6))[~~>]c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c6 ` s0)[≤](c5 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0[≤]c1), d(s0, c4))
  climle(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, seq(c3(+, c6)), seq(c3(+, c5)), w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c2, seq(c3(+, c6)), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c6, c2, w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, c2, seq(c3(+, c5)), cr, w0)
  serfre(s0, c3, c5, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ∈ ℤ, c4 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  syl6eleq(c4, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c2, w0)
  eluzel2(c4, c3)
  serle(s0, c3, c6, hs0, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  syl6eleq(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), c2, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  syl2an((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c6 ` s0)∈ ℝ, w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  syl2an((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c5 ` s0)∈ ℝ, w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  syl2an((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0), (c6 ` s0)[≤](c5 ` s0), w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  simpl(w0, hs0 ∈ c2)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈(c3[...]hs0))
  elfzuz(s0, c3, hs0)

blocks.name: abscvgcvg
blocks.content: An absolutely convergent series is convergent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm abscvgcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cdm(cli)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), cdm(cli)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  cvgcmpce(s0, c0, c1, c2, c0, c3, nat1, w0)
  syl6eleqr(c0, c2, cfv(cuz, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  uzid(c0)
  1red(w0)
  sylan2br(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  eleq2i(cv(s0), c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  breqtrrd(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cle, co(nat1, cmul, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqled(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqcomd(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  mulid2d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  recnd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr, cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  abscld(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

thm abscvgcvg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c1))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ c2 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c3 ` s0)=(abs `(c1 ` s0)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2)→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → seq(c0(+, c3))∈ dom(~~>))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  cvgcmpce(s0, c0, c1, c2, c0, c3, nat1, w0)
  syl6eleqr(c0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c0)
  1red(w0)
  sylan2br(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (abs `(c1 ` s0))[≤](1[×](c3 ` s0)), s0 ∈ c2)
  eleq2i(s0, c2, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  breqtrrd((abs `(c1 ` s0)), cle, (1[×](c3 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  eqled((abs `(c1 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  eqcomd((abs `(c1 ` s0)), (c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  mulid2d((c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  recnd((c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  eqeltrd((c3 ` s0), cr, (abs `(c1 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  abscld((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c2))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: climfsum
blocks.content: Limit of a finite sum of converging sequences. Note that ` F ( k ) ` is a collection of functions with implicit parameter ` k ` , each of which converges to ` B ( k ) ` as ` n ~~> +oo ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm climfsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, csu(s0, c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(c5, cli, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, csu(s0, c1, c2))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, cli, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cli, csu(s0, c1, c2)))
  eqbrtrd(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cli, csu(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1)), csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))), cli, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))), crli, csu(s0, c1, c2)))
  fsumrlim(s1, s0, c3, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)), c2, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(c3, cr))
  sstri(c3, cr, cz)
  eqsstri(c3, cz, cfv(cuz, c4))
  uzssz(c4)
  zssre()
  fvexd(c5, cv(s1), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), crli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), cli, c2))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), cli, c2), wbr(c5, cli, c2))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wb(wbr(c5, cli, c2), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), cli, c2)), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(c5, universe), wbr(c5, cli, c2))
  brrelex1i(c5, cli, c2)
  climrel()
  climmpt(s1, c4, c5, universe, c2, cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))))
  rlimclim(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), c2, c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(c4, cz))
  fmpttd(s1, c3, cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cc))
  rlimclim(cmpt(s1, c3, csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))), csu(s0, c1, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  fmpttd(s1, c3, csu(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1))), cc, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c1, cfv(c5, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(c1, cfn))
  anass1rs(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cc))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cli, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cli, csu(s0, c1, c2))), wcel(c4, cz), wcel(c0, c6))
  climmpt(s1, c4, c0, c6, csu(s0, c1, c2), cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), c3)
  eqid(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csu.s(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm climfsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→ c5[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))→(c5 ` s1)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)→(c0 ` s1)= sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), d(s1, c4))
  mpbird(w0, c0[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c0 ` s1))[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  eqbrtrd((s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c0 ` s1)), cli, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s1, c3, (c0 ` s1), sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1)))[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1)))[~~>r]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2))
  fsumrlim(s1, s0, c3, c1, (c5 ` s1), c2, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, c3 ⊆ ℝ)
  sstri(c3, cr, cz)
  eqsstri(c3, cz, (ℤ≥ ` c4))
  uzssz(c4)
  zssre()
  fvexd(c5, s1, (w0 ∧(s1 ∈ c3 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1))[~~>r]c2, (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1))[~~>]c2)
  mpbid((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1))[~~>]c2, c5[~~>]c2)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), (c5[~~>]c2 ↔(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1))[~~>]c2), c4 ∈ ℤ, c5 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), c5 ∈ 𝕌, c5[~~>]c2)
  brrelex1i(c5, cli, c2)
  climrel()
  climmpt(s1, c4, c5, universe, c2, (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1)), c3)
  eqid((s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1)))
  rlimclim((s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c5 ` s1)), c2, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantr(w0, s0 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ ℤ)
  fmpttd(s1, c3, (c5 ` s1), cc, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3, (c5 ` s1)∈ ℂ)
  rlimclim((s1 ∈ c3 ↦ sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1))), sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), c3, c4, w0)
  fmpttd(s1, c3, sum(s0 ∈ c1,(c5 ` s1)), cc, w0)
  fsumcl(s0, c1, (c5 ` s1), (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ Fin)
  anass1rs(w0, s1 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c1, (c5 ` s1)∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)↔(s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c0 ` s1))[~~>]sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2)), c4 ∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ c6)
  climmpt(s1, c4, c0, c6, sum(s0 ∈ c1, c2), (s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c0 ` s1)), c3)
  eqid((s1 ∈ c3 ↦(c0 ` s1)))
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, s1 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.csu.s(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: fsumiun
blocks.content: Sum over a disjoint indexed union. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Dec-2016.)

thm fsumiun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s1, c0, c1))

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

} = {
  mpi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2), csu(s1, c0, csu(s0, c1, c2))), wss(c0, c0))

  mpcom(w0, wi(wss(c0, c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2), csu(s1, c0, csu(s0, c1, c2)))), wcel(c0, cfn))
  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, wi(w0, wi(wss(c0, c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2), csu(s1, c0, csu(s0, c1, c2))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(emptycls, c0), wceq(csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs1), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), csu(s0, c1, c2))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), c2), csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), csu(s0, c1, c2))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2)))), wi(wss(emptycls, c0), wceq(csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2))), wss(emptycls, c0), wceq(csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, c0)
  eqeq12d(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2)), csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1d(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2, emptycls, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl6eq(ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), emptycls, ciun(s1, emptycls, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  iuneq1(s1, cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)
  0iun(s1, c1)
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2)))), wi(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs1), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), csu(s0, c1, c2)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2))), wss(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs1), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), csu(s0, c1, c2))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)

  sumeq1d(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2, ciun(s1, cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  iuneq1(s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2))), wss(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), c2), csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), csu(s0, c1, c2))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0)
  eqeq12d(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2)), csu(s0, ciun(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), c2), csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), csu(s0, c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  sumeq1d(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2, ciun(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2)))))
  iuneq1(s1, cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1)
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), csu(s0, c1, c2))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2)))), wi(wss(c0, c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2), csu(s1, c0, csu(s0, c1, c2)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2))), wss(c0, c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2), csu(s1, c0, csu(s0, c1, c2))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), c0, c0)
  eqeq12d(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs0), csu(s0, c1, c2)), csu(s0, ciun(s1, c0, c1), c2), csu(s1, c0, csu(s0, c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sumeq1d(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs0), c1), c2, ciun(s1, c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  iuneq1(s1, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), c0, csu(s0, c1, c2))
  2a1i(w0, wss(emptycls, c0), wceq(csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2))))
  eqtr4i(csu(s0, emptycls, c2), csu(s1, emptycls, csu(s0, c1, c2)), nat0)
  sum0(s0, c2)
  sum0(s1, csu(s0, c1, c2))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs1), cfn), wn(wcel(cv(hs2), cv(hs1))), wi(wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cv(hs1), c1), c2), csu(s1, cv(hs1), csu(s0, c1, c2))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c0), wceq(csu(s0, ciun(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), c2), csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), csu(s0, c1, c2)))))))

blocks.name: hashiun
blocks.content: The cardinality of a disjoint indexed union. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Dec-2016.)

thm hashiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, cfv(chash, c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, cfv(chash, c1)), csu(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), nat1), csu(s0, c0, csu(hs0, c1, nat1)), w0)
  fsumiun(hs0, s0, c0, c1, nat1, w0)
  1cnd(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  eqtrd(csu(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), nat1), cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), co(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), cmul, nat1), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wceq(csu(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), nat1), co(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), cmul, nat1)), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cfn), wcel(nat1, cc))
  fsumconst(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), nat1)
  4syl(w0, wceq(co(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), cmul, nat1), cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cfn), wcel(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)), cc))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cfn)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  iunfi(s0, c0, c1)
  hashcl(ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  nn0cn(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  mulid1(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, csu(hs0, c1, nat1), cfv(chash, c1), w0)
  eqtrd(csu(hs0, c1, nat1), cfv(chash, c1), co(cfv(chash, c1), cmul, nat1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(csu(hs0, c1, nat1), co(cfv(chash, c1), cmul, nat1)), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  fsumconst(hs0, c1, nat1)
  4syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(cfv(chash, c1), cmul, nat1), cfv(chash, c1)), wcel(c1, cfn), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cn0), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cc))
  hashcl(c1)
  nn0cn(cfv(chash, c1))
  mulid1(cfv(chash, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm hashiun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))= sum(s0 ∈ c0,(# ` c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(# ` c1)), sum(hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), 1), sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(hs0 ∈ c1, 1)), w0)
  fsumiun(hs0, s0, c0, c1, nat1, w0)
  1cnd((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  eqtrd(sum(hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), 1), (# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), ((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))[×]1), w0)
  sylancl(w0, sum(hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), 1)=((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))[×]1), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ Fin, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  fsumconst(hs0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), nat1)
  4syl(w0, ((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))[×]1)=(# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ Fin, (# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))∈ ℕ0, (# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))∈ ℂ)
  syl2anc(w0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ Fin, c0 ∈ Fin, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ Fin)
  iunfi(s0, c0, c1)
  hashcl(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  nn0cn((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  mulid1((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, sum(hs0 ∈ c1, 1), (# ` c1), w0)
  eqtrd(sum(hs0 ∈ c1, 1), (# ` c1), ((# ` c1)[×]1), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  sylancl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), sum(hs0 ∈ c1, 1)=((# ` c1)[×]1), c1 ∈ Fin, 1 ∈ ℂ)
  ax-1cn()
  fsumconst(hs0, c1, nat1)
  4syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ((# ` c1)[×]1)=(# ` c1), c1 ∈ Fin, (# ` c1)∈ ℕ0, (# ` c1)∈ ℂ)
  hashcl(c1)
  nn0cn((# ` c1))
  mulid1((# ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
}

thm hash2iun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2))), csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, cfv(chash, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c2, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wdisj(s1, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, ciun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2))), csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, cfv(chash, c2))), csu(s0, c0, cfv(chash, ciun(s1, c1, c2))), w0)
  hashiun(s0, c0, ciun(s1, c1, c2), w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(ciun(s1, c1, c2), cfn), wcel(c1, cfn), wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, cfn)))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cfn))
  iunfi(s1, c1, c2)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(chash, ciun(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, cfv(chash, c2)), w0)
  hashiun(s1, c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  3expa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c2, cfn))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm hash2iun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2)))= sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1,(# ` c2))))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ c2 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → ⊔(s0 ∈ c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ⊔(s1 ∈ c1, c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd((# ` ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2))), sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1,(# ` c2))), sum(s0 ∈ c0,(# ` ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2))), w0)
  hashiun(s0, c0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2), w0)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2)∈ Fin, c1 ∈ Fin, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Fin))
  ralrimiva(s1, c1, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), c2 ∈ Fin)
  iunfi(s1, c1, c2)
  sumeq2dv(s0, c0, (# ` ⋃(s1 ∈ c1, c2)), sum(s1 ∈ c1,(# ` c2)), w0)
  hashiun(s1, c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  3expa(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ Fin)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm hashrabrex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {

  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, crab(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1))), csu(s1, c1, cfv(chash, crab(s0, c0, w1))))), diffsc(s0, c0))

thm hashuni(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, cuni(c0)), csu(s0, c0, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s0, c0, cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)

  uniiun(s0, c0)
  hashiun(s0, c0, cv(s0), w0)
  sselda(cv(s0), c0, cfn, w0)

blocks.name: qshash
blocks.content: The cardinality of a set with an equivalence relation is the sum of the cardinalities of its equivalence classes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qshash(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(chash, c0), csu(s0, cqs(c0, c1), cfv(chash, cv(s0)))))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c1, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(cfv(chash, c0), csu(s0, cqs(c0, c1), cfv(chash, cv(s0))), cfv(chash, cuni(cqs(c0, c1))), w0)
  fveq2d(chash, cuni(cqs(c0, c1)), c0, w0)
  uniqs2(c0, c1, universe, w0)
  sylc(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wer(c1, c0), wcel(c0, cfn))
  erex(c1, c0, cfn)
  hashuni(s0, cqs(c0, c1), w0)
  ssfid(cqs(c0, c1), cpw(c0), w0)
  sylib(w0, wcel(cpw(c0), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn))
  pwfi(c0)
  sstrd(cqs(c0, c1), cfn, cpw(c0), w0)
  qsss(c0, c1, w0)
  ssrdv(s0, cpw(c0), cfn, w0)
  syl2im(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cfn), wcel(c0, cfn), wss(cv(s0), c0))
  elpwi(cv(s0), c0)
  ex(wcel(c0, cfn), wss(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cfn))
  ssfi(c0, cv(s0))
  syl(w0, wdisj(s0, cqs(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wer(c1, c0))
  qsdisj2(s0, c1, c0, c0)
  diff.cqs.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cfn.s(s0)
}
